quote.quotes: "If you're alone... if it's just your life
quote.anime: you can use it however you please/ Wear yourself out
quote.name: doesn't matter. But when there's two

quote.quotes: "Every phenomenon that happens in the human world is caused by people for their own convenience."
quote.name: Takano Miyo

quote.quotes: "The scars that you can't see are the hardest to heal."
quote.name: Nao Tomori

quote.quotes: "You can run from your past all you want
quote.anime: but it will always follow you. Forever and ever and ever and ever."

quote.quotes: "Having too many bonds causes one to lose focus
quote.name: Naruto Shippuuden

quote.quotes: "The moment people come to know love
quote.anime: they run the risk of carrying hate."

quote.quotes: "There are times like that music can convey more than words. "
quote.name: Kunio Yaobi

quote.quotes: "Trying to improve by learning from others that is what calls friendship."
quote.name: Shino Aburame

quote.quotes: "Freedom is something that you need to actively acquire. It's not something that's given with no strings attached. To be free means to take responsibility
quote.anime: and to prepare yourself for what's to come."

quote.quotes: "All people are nothing but tools. It doesn't matter how it's done. It doesn't matter what needs to be sacrificed. In this world
quote.anime: winning is everything. As long as I win in the end...That's all that matters."
quote.id: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e

quote.quotes: "Evil expects evil from others."
quote.name: Osamu Dazai

quote.quotes: "It's not bad to dream. But you also have to consider what's realistic. "
quote.name: All Might

quote.quotes: "Humans are creatures that always get hurt and feel regret whenever they make a choice on something. "
quote.anime: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
quote.name: Glenn Radars

quote.quotes: "This epidemic leads innocent people to their deaths
quote.anime: and yet it's pathogen will never be eradicated. This is a disease called serenity
quote.id: a form of death that people have wished for."
quote.name: Psycho-Pass

quote.quotes: "A sword wields no strength
quote.anime: unless the hand that holds it has courage. "

quote.quotes: "Things would have been so much better back then... If we had heard each other's voices. I hate myself. I was selfish
quote.anime: and I never thought about anyone else's feelings. Since then
quote.id: my classmates have all looked down on me. I've lived for seventeen years
quote.name: and I haven't lived one of them as a good person. The only time I heard your voice was when we got into that fight. And what pisses me off the most is the fact that I haven't changed at all since back then! But.

quote.quotes: "Just your touch... gets me excited. It makes me so happy. But those feelings will all turn into pain. The happier I am now
quote.anime: the more it'll hurt. I know how cruel this is... but no matter how hard I try
quote.id: I can't rid myself of this. Nejima-kun... I... don't know... what love is."
quote.name: Koi to Uso

quote.quotes: "*to Jyugo* You're such a gloomy Gus
quote.name: and so pessimistic. You're also dull

quote.quotes: "Back then
quote.anime: if we could have have heard each other's voices
quote.id: everything would have been so much better."
quote.name: Koe no Katachi

quote.quotes: "Even though you like someone already
quote.anime: your partner is decided for you... and you can't do anything about that crush. Because everyone keeps getting in the way... and saying you can't... But... when you're the one in love... the only thing that feels true... is that feeling."

quote.quotes: "There's more to a real man than just his good looks!"
quote.name: Uno

quote.quotes: "If I'm going to disappear no matter what
quote.anime: I at least want to leave them having fun and smiling."

quote.quotes: "If you take someone at puberty
quote.anime: a teen... introduce him or her to a member of the opposite sex around the same age and say
quote.id: 'This is the person who was meant for you'... and then go on to spend a lot of time together... why wouldn't you fall for them?"
quote.name: Koi to Uso

quote.quotes: "I want you to please understand the scales of my heart will always be swaying back and forth. But there is something you should know. I will never lean to one side or the other due to the weight of gold coins."
quote.name: Horo

quote.quotes: "Even though everything is going to disappear
quote.anime: it isn't supposed to be meaningless. It's exactly because you know you're going to part ways
quote.id: that now and only now is your only chance."
quote.name: ReLIFE

quote.quotes: "I don't really want you to understand... I just don't want you to be like
quote.id: is that all'? I don't need people to get it. These feelings... are important to me
quote.name: and they're just for me."

quote.quotes: "It's a programmer's job to make the most of limited resources to turn an impractical idea into reality."
quote.name: Akasaka Ryuunosuke

quote.quotes: "Making sure I have no regrets... that would just be self-serving
quote.anime: nothing more. It's all right. I mean
quote.id: this is a great memory in itself
quote.name: right?"

quote.quotes: "There are things I don't want to forget... Memories of time spent with friends. Memories of time spent with her alone. Memories are important. But there's something even more important... That's to continue making memories."
quote.name: Yūki Hase

quote.quotes: "I have no fear of watching you grow old while I remain young. I'll even watch you on your death bed. I am no stranger to death. But your heart is like that of an innocent child. It has always accepted everything about me
quote.anime: without hesitation. Because of that I am very afraid."

quote.quotes: "I yearn for true gender equality. I have no patience for one who talks about female privilege when it suits them
quote.anime: and then complains about someone 'not being a man' when it's convenient."
quote.id: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!

quote.quotes: "But... If you're the kind of person who can devote herself like that to someone
quote.anime: then I'll bet you anything there's someone out there who'll fall in love with you."

quote.quotes: "Yeah
quote.anime: if I saw her smiling to herself while reading this
quote.id: I might think it was creepy. But there's something wrong with people who talk trash and laugh behind another's back
quote.name: too."

quote.quotes: "Stop pouting! You learned something valuable. Remember the lesson
"You're right. Whether I ever see that girl again or not
quote.anime: that doesn't change the fact that this promise is important to me. I'm gonna go on treasuring it."

quote.quotes: "Lies are told prevent yourself from getting hurt."
quote.name: Kamiyama

quote.quotes: "I believe that there's not a single person whose heart is evil."
quote.name: Kanzaki Nao

quote.quotes: "What is love?
Its when your eyes start following someone
quote.anime: and you look for them if they’re not around. You get excited thinking you might run into him when you’re putting your shoes on in the morning. And when you don’t it’s a little disappointing. But then you pass by him and that makes you happy for the rest of the day. It feels like you can handle anything. Seeing him is enough to make you happy."

quote.quotes: "I do not want to wake from my dream and discover that I am all alone. I am tired of being alone! I do not want to be cold! I do not want to be lonely!"
quote.name: Horo

quote.quotes: "People don't fall in love based on looks. And that's a scientific fact."
quote.name: Ichijou Kagetsu

quote.quotes: "The ones who accomplish something are the fools who keep pressing onward. The ones who accomplish nothing are the wise who cease advancing."
quote.anime: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
quote.name: Celica Arfonia

quote.quotes: "I am Horo the Wise Wolf
quote.anime: and I am a very proud wolf."

quote.quotes: "Just walk the path you believe in. And don't forget
quote.anime: you're the main character of your own life story!"
quote.id: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records

quote.quotes: "I am not so grand
quote.anime: not as a god. I am Horo
quote.id: and Horo is all that I am."
quote.name: Spice and Wolf

quote.quotes: "To hell with living a life of revenge
quote.anime: I'm me! I live for myself! You're not my sworn enemy or anything else. You're nothing but a putrid demon!"

quote.quotes: "Explosion!!!"
quote.anime: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
quote.name: Megumin

quote.quotes: "The only one who can decide your worth.. is you. If you want to earn something
quote.anime: you need to reach out for it. Pro-athletes give up their teenage years to train. Business owners put up collateral to borrow money. That's how it always works. To make your ambitions come true
quote.id: you have to take risks. The larger the ambition the greater the risk. That might involve time or enough work to affect your lifespan... So make your choice. Live in peace as a wannabe or risk losing it all to reach the very top. You're the one who needs to decide."
quote.name: Kakegurui

quote.quotes: "Who'd want to date girls that talk smack about your friends?"
quote.name: Makoto Sunakawa

quote.quotes: "I have so many things I want to say
quote.anime: so many things I want to ask you
quote.id: but... When I see your face... None of that matters anymore!"
quote.name: Akame ga KILL!

quote.quotes: "The amount of money one owns ultimately decides the victor. This doesn't stop within the walls of a casino
quote.anime: or it's cash flow. It's a rule that forms the basis for a capitalist society!"

quote.quotes: "The lifespan of a human is certainly way too short. That's why you've got to make the most of it and live your life to the fullest."
quote.name: Leone

quote.quotes: "It's true that you're lacking in ability. That's because you don't work at it. However
quote.anime: you have a natural potential. That's why I chose you."

quote.quotes: "Enjoy your life today. Yesterday is gone
quote.anime: and the tomorrow might never come.

quote.quotes: "People who are still tormented by their consciences are still worth saving. "
quote.name: Akiyama Shinichi

quote.quotes: "That's people for you. Trusting one another
quote.anime: helping one another- it's all a fantasy. Humans are creatures that will always betray."

quote.quotes: "Why do I want to win so much...? Everyone takes up soccer for different reasons. But we all have a passion for the sport... That drive carries us through a game
quote.anime: even if we lose. If we win
quote.id: it pushes us forward to the next game. The winners of the game honour the losers by playing with everything they have... and until we hit a wall
quote.name: until a better team beats us

quote.quotes: "I want to reply with a long message
quote.id: that might be kind of revolting. But if it's too short
quote.name: then I might come off as cold instead. Feeling apprehensive of what to do

quote.quotes: "A road is something that you make yourself."
quote.name: Jotaro Kujo

quote.quotes: "If what I wished for was granted to me
quote.anime: if what I wanted was given to me. Then
quote.name: I wouldn't wish for anything nor want anything. Because the things you were granted and the things you were given were surely shams that would one day be lost.

quote.quotes: The things you wished for had no shape and the things you wanted were untouchable. Or possibly
quote.anime: they might be the most wonderful treasures that would become nothing if you were to touch them. "
quote.id: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku

quote.quotes: "It' because you were embarrassed
quote.name: and jealous. If there's a time when those ill feelings surfaced

quote.quotes: Being aware of your eventual break up was a rather complicated thing. If you wanted to graduate with a smile
quote.anime: shouldn't you avoid approaching your friends too much? And that's where having no friends was super convenient!"
quote.id: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku

quote.quotes: "I don't think I'll learn anything if I don't try to do something about it on my own."
quote.name: Hishiro Chizuru

quote.quotes: "If you've got energy to spend on feeling guilty
quote.anime: then use it to show your gratitude."

quote.quotes: "To realize a mistake. To not lie. To love one another. To not kill. Those are very simple things
quote.anime: but these times won't allow for them. There is no green on this planet
quote.id: even though we want it... though we want it so badly. A place where we can live peaceful days with no wars nor stealing. A sacred place where people can live as people. Yes there
quote.name: that place is called Paradise."

quote.quotes: "Compared to failing without even trying
quote.id: even at the risk of a mistake."
quote.name: Grisaia no Kajitsu

quote.quotes: "No matter what you're doing
quote.anime: the most essential thing is to not give up. Fail as many times as it takes. Keep trying persistantly untill you can call yourself 'avarage'. If you can collect a nice group of avarage-level skills
quote.id: that's already above-avarage. You've created your own sort of 'talent'."
quote.name: Grisaia no Kajitsu

quote.quotes: "It's easy to say 'choose so that you'll have no regrets
quote.anime: ' but that's impossible. No matter how hard you've agonized over your path
quote.id: you'll always regret something about it later. That's just how we humans are made. Which is why I think our true feelings are important. If you choose your path based on your true feelings
quote.name: it'll hurt just a little less when you feel the same regret

quote.quotes: "Someone told me this: 'Nothing is 'forever' in human relationships'. That might be true
quote.anime: but it sounds awfully lonely. But I realized today... If there really is no such thing as 'forever'... Then having someone important is the happiest thing one can attain in life."

quote.quotes: "Instead of judging others based on rumors and gossip articles
quote.anime: I must look and feel for myself. You cannot know anyone without coming face-to-face with them."

quote.quotes: "If at some point in life
quote.anime: you made a mistake or keep failing over and over again
quote.id: and you can't help but think it's useless and you're a good for nothing; Remember
quote.name: you're only taking a detour. And I'm sure further along your path will come a day where you think

quote.quotes: " Success is harder than failure for many things in this world."
quote.name: Osamu Dazai

quote.quotes: "You're wrong. It's not the world that's messed up; it's those of us in it. Yes
quote.anime: some ghouls walk a path that leaves sorrow in their wake
quote.name: we can choose a different path altogether. We have a lot to learn

quote.quotes: "Even if we walk on different paths
quote.anime: one must always live on as you are able! You must never treat your own life as something insignificant! You must never forget the friends you love for as long as you live! Let bloom the flowers of light within your hearts."

quote.quotes: "There is no such thing as truth in this world. That is our reality. Anyone can become a God or a Devil. All it takes is for someone to claim that to be the truth."
quote.name: Eren Kruger

quote.quotes: "Those who forgive themselves
quote.anime: and are able to accept their true nature... They are the strong ones!"

quote.quotes: "People's lives don't belong to anyone. Anyone
quote.anime: except themselves. But people have a path. The path of how to use that life."

quote.quotes: "Unfortunately
quote.anime: I don't have a nice eyeball like you
quote.id: that can see this and that. All I can do to pursue one thing in front of me. So whether it's the abyss of death or an empty void
quote.name: I won't fight for the manju offered to my grave. I'll fight for tomorrow's breakfast. That's all."

quote.quotes: "You shouldn't judge something without trying it first. Having a variety of experiences is what makes life worth living."
quote.anime: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
quote.name: Leticia Draculair

quote.quotes: "Well it's not like the world is full of sunshine and daisies. If society was only shaped by the view that one must be happy-go-lucky all the time
quote.name: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru.

quote.quotes: "There isn't anything that's evil to everyone. Even the worst evil saves something. On the other hand
quote.anime: even the greatest good hurts someone. The phrase 'There are no absolutes in this world' means there isn't any absolute good or absolute evil."

quote.quotes: "Being angry consumes energy and makes me tired. So I'd rather apologize
quote.anime: even if I'm not at fault. Besides
quote.name: and we both want to stay friends. Prolonging an awkward situation out of stubbornness is just silly."

quote.quotes: "You're absolutely right. I can't do anything alone.  Everyone has their flaws and imperfections
quote.anime: but that's what drives us to work together... To make up for those flaws. Together
quote.id: we make the perfect main character. "
quote.name: Gintama

quote.quotes: "Miracles are illusions caused by insufficient observation and understanding. They're just... glorious misunderstandings."
quote.name: Tanya Degurechaff

quote.quotes: "Smile. Not for anyone else
quote.anime: but for yourself. Show yourself your own smile. You'll feel better then."

quote.quotes: "Every day
quote.anime: the words cross my mind.  'If I had done this back then...' but they don't take the sincere form of regret.  The words are just an excuse that come to my mind then disappear."

quote.quotes: "I'd talk
quote.anime: but... I fell into the habit of not saying what I really felt
quote.id: somewhere along the way. And then I started believing that there wasn't anything... that I really wanted to tell anyone."
quote.name: Kokoro ga Sakebitagatterunda.

quote.quotes: "It's not like people only look for help by saying 'please help me.' In similiar vein
quote.anime: it's not like you're only in love with someone if you say 'I love you.' Everyone has things they can't say on impulse."

quote.quotes: "Pride is an eminent trait
quote.anime: but too much will cause arrogance. That is when it becomes disgusting."

quote.quotes: "It's not like something is going to happen because I believe in it.  Sometimes you end up worse off because you believed in something too much. There are times it's tough to believe in something."
quote.name: Eureka

quote.quotes: "I intended to listen to your voice
quote.anime: but it really was nothing but intentions. It's pretty obvious
quote.id: huh? Of course there's more going on than what people choose to tell you... But I convinced myself that was all there is to a person. I knew that
quote.name: but still I interpreted the stuff I didn't understand about you in ways convenient for me... That's just how I am."

quote.quotes: "Today might be the chance to grasp the chance to let your talent bloom. Maybe tomorrow
quote.id: or next year... Maybe even when you're thirty. I'm not sure if physique has anything to do with it
quote.name: but if you think that it will never come

quote.quotes: "Books are nice
quote.anime: aren't they? With just one sentence you can get lost in all sorts of dreams. They way I think of it
quote.id: literature allows the reader's consciousness to deeply relish the author and be closer to him. And so
quote.name: we freely walk around the world of the story from the yarn spinner's point of view. It's only when you immerse yourself in the world of a book that you are able to forget just who you are."

quote.quotes: "The universe has a beginning
Stars
quote.name: but their own power results in their destruction. — Finite.

quote.quotes: It is those who possess wisdom who are the greatest fools. History has shown us this.
You could say that this is the final warning from God to those who resist. "
quote.name: Okabe Rintarou

quote.quotes: "Simplicity is the easiest path to true beauty."
quote.name: Handa Seishū

quote.quotes: "Stop pitying yourself. Pity yourself
quote.anime: and life becomes an endless nightmare."

quote.quotes: "For a pregnant woman to give birth
quote.anime: she's gotta feel the pain of pulling a watermelon out of her nostril. For an Artist to create a masterpiece
quote.id: he's gotta feel the pain of pulling entire galaxies out  of his ass."
quote.name: Gintama

quote.quotes: "You can only become friends by talking to people and finding out whether you get along."
quote.name: Shougo Kiryuu

quote.quotes: "Anything I would never want to lose is always lost. It is a given that everything that is worth wanting will be lost the moment I obtain it. There's nothing worth pursuing at the cost of prolonging a life of suffering."
quote.name: Osamu Dazai

quote.quotes: "The two of us aren't so different. My whole life I've desired from others. I felt bitter to the people around me and I closed off my heart...and a heart that lets nothing in..will become empty before you realize it. But in this world
quote.anime: you'll sometimes meet meddlesome people who will
quote.name: give you the love you need. And for someone like you or me

quote.quotes: "You can become happy right now.' I won't say these types of absurd lies. However
quote.anime: if you get through these current hardships and survive - a time where you can be happy will come."

quote.quotes: "It may be hard right now... But you must silence those thoughts! Stop counting only those things that you have lost! What is gone
quote.anime: is gone! So ask yourself this: What is there... that still remains to you?!"

quote.quotes: "A castle that vanishes at the first gust of wind is worthless. A skyscraper within your mind will never fall down."
quote.name: Satsuki Kiryuuin

quote.quotes: "What's important is not what's right
quote.anime: but what we believe is right."
quote.id: Atelier Escha & Logy: Alchemists of the Dusk Sky

quote.quotes: "Unlike in manga and anime
quote.id: no heroes can save you when you're down."
quote.name: Denpa Kyoushi

quote.quotes: "Even if everyone in the whole world dies
quote.id: as long as my beloved survives."
quote.name: Durarara!!

quote.quotes: "I believe the difference between those up there and me is the question of whether you have given up or not."
quote.name: Ja Wangnan

quote.quotes: "People don't kill people
quote.anime: really. Monsters do. Monsters like war
quote.name: and greedy kingdoms. And monsters like me

quote.quotes: "Our lives become a reality through the most meticulous calculations. Doing our best to continue living is a resolution ingrained in all of us. And this shapes the right future for us. You could say it is life’s greatest mystery. I want to observe the destination reached by the many lives that are created."
quote.name: Akari

quote.quotes: "This world offers no guarantees for the future."
quote.name: Jun'ichi Hoshiyama

quote.quotes: "It's times like this that I wish I could come up with an appropriate response.  I hate myself for not being able to reply properly.  "
quote.name: Takashi Natsume

quote.quotes: "Leaving my mother's body
quote.anime: for the first time I learned the chill of cold air and the warmth of human hands.

quote.quotes: Cradled by my father and carried out of that room
quote.id: I learned the extent of the

quote.quotes: sky and the vast expanse of the world.  Stepping off my everyday path
which I'd never yet heard. Beyond...Beyond this planet..To learn what I still don't know. One more step beyond...
Closer to you."
quote.name: Kou Ichinomiya

quote.quotes: "And the one person who I thought understood me was just using me all along. No one ever treated me as an equal. Adults are all trash. They didn't listen when I said that it hurt. They didn't listen when I told them to stop. They didn't listen to anything I said!"
quote.name: Chris Yukine

quote.quotes: "That’s just the way it is. Change is inevitable. Instead of resisting it
quote.anime: you’re better served simple going with the flow."

quote.quotes: "Man fears death and yet
quote.id: man is drawn to death. Death is endlessly consumed by men in cities and in literature. It is a singular event in one's life that none may reverse. That is what I desire."
quote.name: Bungou Stray Dogs 2nd Season

quote.quotes: "While it takes time to recover from the loss of a loved one
quote.anime: having an opportunity to take your mind off things helps too."

quote.quotes: "The root of all your evil is in always relying on one of your other possibilities to get your wish. You must accept that you are the person here
quote.id: and that you cannot become anyone else other than that person."
quote.name: Yojouhan Shinwa Taikei

quote.quotes: "No matter how careful your risk hedging is
quote.anime: there will still be holes in your plan! Realizing them and making sure that they are promptly dealt with
quote.id: is the duty of those who stand at the top."
quote.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V

quote.quotes: "Smiles are what connect people! It allows them to communicate through their souls! Souls that are connected... Will never lose to power that only relies on control!"
quote.name: Yuzu Hiiragi

quote.quotes: "Your god is a fragment of your imagination from your weakness."
quote.name: Twenty-Fifth Baam

quote.quotes: "I have no idea what you really want
quote.id: or what the right thing to do really is. But I'm your friend. Let me stay."
quote.name: Ore Monogatari!!

quote.quotes: "Anyway
quote.anime: here's my point. Trivial setbacks like yours and mine are nothing but common occurrences in everyday life! Getting hung up over pointless crap like that shows that you're a joke! A complete and utter joke!"

quote.quotes: "Remember that a sword held by someone who is about to die… will never be able to protect anything. "
quote.name: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote.quotes: "Life isn't about counting all the things you've lost
quote.anime: It's about increasing the number of important things in it."

quote.quotes: "Jojo
quote.anime: being human means having limits. I've learned something. The more carefully you scheme
quote.id: the more unexpected events come along"
quote.name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Phantom Blood

quote.quotes: "Do not live bowing down. You must die standing up. "
quote.name: Shigekuni Yamamoto-Genryusai

quote.quotes: "Evil is when you use the weak for your own gain and crush them under your foot."
quote.name: Jotaro Kujo

quote.quotes: "Are you afraid? You don’t want to die
quote.id: if anyone… acts upon the thought of not wanting you to die
quote.name: you will suddenly begin to fear your impending death

quote.quotes: "Courage must know fear and make fear its own! Fear upsets breathing! Conquer fear and your breath will never fail you! Hamon breathing comes from courage! A good human is a brave human! Courage is a marvel of humanity!"
quote.name: William A. Zeppeli

quote.quotes: "A city far away from my homeland.  There
quote.name: perhaps?  That uncontrollable impulse I harbored within me...Has it faded away now

quote.quotes: "Each one of them has something to improve. Victory doesn't come from technique or power alone. In the end
quote.anime: what's needed is a heart that won't give up. The only question is -- Do they have what it takes to push beyond their limits?"

quote.quotes: "Have a dream that you can achieve within your lifetime!"
quote.name: Ryou

quote.quotes: "Old techniques created by others will never be your own. Only what you create and experience for yourself can become your own."
quote.name: Oubu

quote.quotes: "All the people I saw from my cage...All the things I saw from my cage
quote.anime: that was the whole world to me. At first
quote.id: all I could sense was the hostility of the people looking at me from outside...And their feelings of fear. Piercing gazes
quote.name: hurled stones

quote.quotes: "Don’t hesitate to cut the enemy. Don’t falter to finish them off. Much less heal their wounds. That’s unspeakable
quote.anime: nino. Leave the chocolate here. Become a demon
quote.id: nino. As strong as a demon. As wicked as a demon. You have to learn that the only way to stand up against ruthlessness
quote.name: is to become ruthless yourself."

quote.quotes: "I want everyone to feel safe again soon...I want this to be a world where people can without fighting each other."
quote.name: Hange Zoe

quote.quotes: "Those three are best friends.  They have their respective secrets.  And they're deliberately trying not to give themselves away.  But neither Orihara or Shizuo had any secrets whatsoever.  And that resulted in the complete opposite kind of personal relationship."
quote.name: Shinra Kishitani

quote.quotes: "You are fighting out of obligation
quote.anime: not out of hatred. You will never reach me like that. Battle without hatred is like a bird without wings. You’ll never defeat anyone like that. You powerless friends are just weights that will break your legs. "

quote.quotes: "You see
quote.anime: I really hate the word 'responsibility' saying something or doing something 'it's your responsibility' 'take responsibility' making a 'selection' always comes with 'responsibility.' That's why I abandoned 'selection' therefore
quote.id: I don't have to bear any responsibility anymore. "
quote.name: Torikago no Tsugai

quote.quotes: "You cannot go into battle believing you will lose."
quote.name: Akisame Koetsuji

quote.quotes: "I'll give you some wise words
quote.anime: Shining Sleepless General. All heroes die of overwork."

quote.quotes: "Don’t be so stuck-up. Just enjoy this! Killing and being killed. They are just a way to pass time. "
quote.name: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote.quotes: "Sometimes things go badly
quote.anime: even if nobody really did anything wrong."

quote.quotes: "It doesn't make a difference whether you have a talent or not. I mean
quote.anime: that isn't the end goal. You have greater freedom than we do. All I have are games. But you can go anywhere and become anything."
quote.id: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen - Zetsubou-hen

quote.quotes: "You guys sure are a worthless bunch. If you wanna wallow in your tears
quote.anime: save it for after you've done everything you can!"

quote.quotes: "Who wouldn't want their friends to be happy? That's just normal
"As a human
quote.anime: what kind of achievements will you leave behind?  I bet you'll leave behind a legacy as a psychotic killer
quote.name: Durarara!!×2

quote.quotes: "Charging from the front isn't the only way to cross a wall. If pushing doesn't work
quote.anime: why not try pulling? Try thinking from the opposite direction
quote.id: you might be able to find a new way out."
quote.name: Whistle!

quote.quotes: "i'm on a little boat. I'm going against the current of the river
quote.anime: downstream to upstream. If you want something more
quote.id: you move forward with all your might. If you try to stop
quote.name: you fall behind. Humans can never stop moving. If they do not yearn for something... Right! Nothing begins without action! You gain nothing if you do nothing! Satisfaction is stagnation! Stagnation is death! I want to know! See! Feel! Experience! Understand! This monster is amazing

quote.quotes: "In some ways
quote.id: the closer one feels to getting the answer...but in the end
quote.name: it's hard to tell what is really the safe answer. I started to dislike being like that at one point

quote.quotes: "Let those who seek death find it."
quote.name: Father Willibald

quote.quotes: "Having everything handed to you on a silver platter doesn't necessarily equate to happiness. There are too many choices that you don't even want..."
quote.name: Takane Saibara

quote.quotes: "We need to stop living for others. From now on...Let's live for ourselves!!"
quote.name: Historia Reiss

quote.quotes: "I love fighting
quote.id: I hate losing! I only fight to win!!"
quote.name: Vinland Saga

quote.quotes: "After everything I've faced.... Having a future with you snatched away from me ...is definitely the most terrifying thing I've ever had to endure...."
quote.name: Gajeel Redfox

quote.quotes: "Love. I myself have never loved another person.  Most likely
quote.anime: I don't even love myself.  I do have knowledge of it.  But I am incapable of determining whether or not it is vital in my life.  "

quote.quotes: "It's a battle of life and death
quote.anime: and I'm still alive! So I'm not going to give up
quote.id: and I'll keep living. I'll keep living until I die."
quote.name: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar

quote.quotes: "In order to achieve something there are some things that you have to be unsatisfied with in the first place. Having a complex is the source to greatness."
quote.name: Takane Saibara

quote.quotes: "If I'm not at my limit
quote.anime: means I'm not trying as hard as I can!"

quote.quotes: "There are only so many lives I can value. And...I decided who those people were six years ago. So...You shouldn't try to ask for my pity. Because right now
quote.anime: I don't have...Time to spare or room in my heart."

quote.quotes: "Kill me. Make it quick. I no longer have the strength left in me to even walk. If you do not cut me down now
quote.anime: then this will go unsettled for eternity."

quote.quotes: "If there's any possibility that I might visit this city again...Then I challenge you to a duel.  I wish to speak with you head-on
quote.anime: to within an inch of my life...To actually experience the joy of existing in this world...that is my desire."

quote.quotes: "Well
quote.id: then that's the end of it. Crying about it gets you nothing but an empty stomach"
quote.name: Vinland Saga

quote.quotes: "We fall into a routine and make careless mistakes because of that. Maybe it'd be good for us to have some excitement or be under pressure once in a while."
quote.name: Haruhiro

quote.quotes: "Wealth is a nightmare. With each coveted thing we buy
quote.anime: we lose a thing we dream about."

quote.quotes: "I want to survive...And see her again. As a person
quote.anime: I'm really lower than shit...But she knows that
quote.id: and she smiles kindly at me anyway."
quote.name: Shingeki no Kyojin

quote.quotes: "You are human
quote.anime: are you not? You are allowed to make mistakes."

quote.quotes: "Love provides the worth of everything in the world. Without love...gold
quote.name: and women...all are worthless."

quote.quotes: "A true hero is a sage with a clean heart
quote.anime: a fake hero is a fool with an ignoble heart. The sage will be saved and the fool will be punished."

quote.quotes: "Okay. I will protect all of you. I will never let another friend die."
quote.name: Mary

quote.quotes: "I'm a coward. But I wanted to stay by your side. The truth is I was so happy to hear that you needed me
quote.anime: I took advantage of your words. But you're crying again
quote.id: because of me. I'm no blessed vessel. I'm just a piece of junk. I was supposed to guide you
quote.name: but this was the only way I knew how."

quote.quotes: "You keep your nerves on edge and you're always ready to lash out. You distance yourself from everyone. It's because you are afraid of people. YOU are the weakest person in this village."
quote.name: Takuan Sōhō

quote.quotes: "Not all people in prison are criminals"
quote.anime: Shingeki no Kyojin: Before the Fall
quote.name: Cardina Baumeister

quote.quotes: "If all life is so important
quote.anime: then the most evil of all beings on this earth are without a doubt humans. If there weren't any people on earth
quote.id: the environment and conditions that all living things live in would be drastically better. Even if there were no school to teach us the stuff we know
quote.name: it would still be obvious to everyone

quote.quotes: "There's no master who deliberately lets his birds escape from his birdcage "
quote.name: Blue Owl

quote.quotes: "Yeah
quote.anime: we've become friends. When you're in the same party
quote.id: there will be times when things don't go smoothly
quote.name: when you get angry

quote.quotes: "Doesn't it ever get boring always being on the winning side?"
quote.name: Thorkell

quote.quotes: "You asked me if I was ready to carry on. In all honesty
quote.anime: I am not sure of myself. But there is something that must be done now. And I will do it."

quote.quotes: "Yhwach. You desired a world... Where fear would no longer be a burden. But... In a world without fear of death... People will never attain the hope that is to be found from casting their fears aside and preserving through them. While it is true that people can continue to press forward through the simple act of living... That is no way comparable to marching forward in the face of death
quote.anime: while doing their damndest to keep it at bay. That is why... That is why people have given that very march a unique and special name. 'COURAGE.'"

quote.quotes: "I have no Strength
quote.anime: but I want it all. I have no Knowledge
quote.id: but all I do is dream. There's nothing I can do
quote.name: but I struggle in vain"

quote.quotes: "Mongrels though they may be
quote.anime: they're still figures of some slight renown "

quote.quotes: "So you want to die honorably? You are being selfish. Each and every person you killed had his own life. Whether that life was blessed or not ... everyone is born into this world ... they grow up ... some people have family ... some are alone in this world ... some have young children ... some are engaged ... some have pets ...some people have high hopes and great dreams ... other have no ambition at all and you ended everything for them Takezo"
quote.name: Takuan Sōhō

quote.quotes: "You are calm and intelligent
quote.anime: but youth can invite disaster. Do not fight alone."

quote.quotes: "People need to be told they're worthy of being alive by someone else or they can't go on."
quote.name: Atsushi Nakajima

quote.quotes: "How can you work so hard? There might be something really bad waiting for you ahead. How can you still make yourself move on despite that? The older we get...the number of annoying and troublesome things we have to face only increases- and wonderful things stop happening. In the days ahead of us... we have to bear each painful thing one at a time
quote.anime: conquering them...overcoming them...the power to do that just doesn't spring out of me. The power to move ahead."

quote.quotes: "'Selection' is important. Even in life. Living
quote.id: killing are all the results from your selection. Bad luck? Poor fortune? Poor judges of character? You're wrong. It's a selection error for not thinking thoroughly and choosing the answer without proper consideration."
quote.name: Torikago no Tsugai

quote.quotes: "Waiting for you. Waiting for your knock. The only thing that stands between us is a single door. Shining
my shoes and placing a piece of eternally fresh bread in my pocket
When you're ready
quote.anime: just look up at me.  Right now
quote.id: I'm just waiting for you...Waiting for your knock.

quote.quotes: "It's okay to make mistakes. In fact
quote.anime: you should. Making mistakes is how you learn to do it right. Getting a good result isn't the only thing. What matters is that you play your best during the game."

quote.quotes: "I understand the pain of losing a comrade. I've experienced it
quote.anime: too. Please do not forget the pain. You will move forward while holding on to that pain. Please treasure the comrades you have now. Once they are gone
quote.name: you don't realize this until afterwards."

quote.quotes: "I'd had fifteen years to think about him. And I realized that it wasn't a matter of the life or death of flesh. What's important to a warrior is the soul...And where it lies."
quote.name: Thorkell

quote.quotes: "Surely there must be limits to which one may sink. "
quote.name: Gilgamesh

quote.quotes: "The world...God's divine creation...Is so brimming with love...Yet there is no love in the hearts of men."
quote.name: Canute

quote.quotes: "Live on and endure the shadows! There is no light for those who do not know darkness."
quote.name: Takuan Sōhō

quote.quotes: "If you're in a position to save people
quote.anime: you should never even joke like that. My father...The doctor...Would never abandon anyone. He'd never give up on a person's life
quote.id: even if they tried to throw it away."
quote.name: Noragami

quote.quotes: "Look
quote.anime: you.  All this talk about monsters...that's what people have called me ever since I was a kid.  I've snapped and lost sight of everything around me
quote.id: and I've made trouble for Celty more than once or twice.  Even so
quote.name: she still heard me out

quote.quotes: "Not all warriors fight on the battlefield with a sword in hand. A sailor makes his living battling the sea"
quote.name: Leif Ericson

quote.quotes: "The more battles we fought
quote.anime: the more our confidence grew. We weren't afraid of anything back then. But the difference between victory and defeat is paper-thin. We didn't realize this and were arrogant."

quote.quotes: "Kings do not become kings by themselves. If the poor raise up together
quote.anime: declaring that they don't want any money
quote.name: poor seek money so that they can become kings themselves. Which in turn only strengthens the position of the current king."

quote.quotes: "You brake the law and I'll punish you
quote.anime: there is no room for discussion. "

quote.quotes: "Studying is for people to get the knowledge they need to not screw up in life."
quote.name: Makoto Sunakawa

quote.quotes: "If you were to be troubled over something as trivial as losing face
quote.anime: then it's better to not have it at all."

quote.quotes: "Where in this world can a sane man be found? We're the same. We're all the same. None of us understands what it means to love all. Or the meaning of life...Or the meaning of death...Or the meaning of our own battles."
quote.name: Canute

quote.quotes: "The world offers up a choice to live or die. The survival of the fittest that's the only governing law this world recognizes."
quote.name: Gai Tsutsugami

quote.quotes: "There are days when nothing goes right. There are days when you stumble and fall. There are days when you just want to cry. To cry a lot. To sleep a lot. Or even eat a lot. It's alright
quote.anime: as long as you pick yourself up again."

quote.quotes: "I believe that people have the individual right to decide how they want to live. So whether you just listen to what others say
quote.anime: or get stuck a lot of times...and cause trouble to others
quote.id: it ultimately comes back to yourself."
quote.name: Torikago no Tsugai

quote.quotes: "I know we can't immediately treat her as part of our group
quote.anime: but if we always think of her as an outsider
quote.id: she'll never have a chance to become part of our group."
quote.name: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar

quote.quotes: "That kid's good point is that he feels he doesn't have much skill. It's this kind of person that will keep on improving."
quote.name: Mizuno Tatsuya

quote.quotes: "If you hurt me
quote.anime: then so be it. Do you think that there is any human in all the world who has never hurt another? You are all so kind...It hurts you to hurt others. That is why I had been hiding my pain
quote.name: Noragami

quote.quotes: "Only those who do their jobs on the battlefield get the rewards they desire. That's the life of a warrior."
quote.name: Askeladd

quote.quotes: "Being strong isn't just about having power or move
"No matter how many years it's been since they met
quote.id: aren't they? Even without having seen
quote.name: I can tell."

quote.quotes: "If your failing
quote.anime: then keep trying until you don't."

quote.quotes: "Even if there's nothing here today
quote.anime: there might be something tomorrow.  It's a caring heart that's important.  "

quote.quotes: "People...At least
quote.anime: all children are born into a world that seems unreasonable and crazy to them. No one is asked at birth if they agree to come into the world. Everyone is born that way."

quote.quotes: "Humanity will never stop fighting itself.. until it shrinks to a size of one or fewer."
quote.name: Erwin Smith

quote.quotes: "These days
quote.anime: I feel more comfortable in dark places.  I look at these shadows as a part of you.  They absorb all the light.  There's no one in the world who has this color but you. "

quote.quotes: "You have no enemies. No one...Has any enemies. There is no one...That you should hurt"
quote.name: Thors

quote.quotes: "It doesn't matter what you were like before. Nobody cares."
quote.name: Haruhiro

quote.quotes: "Living has it own challenges. I'll give you just one piece of advice. Don't quit. Yes
quote.id: you die. But if you give up
quote.name: you're definitely going to die. That

quote.quotes: "You're fat
quote.anime: slow and sloppy. It's not the outside that counts
quote.id: but there's a limit to that too."
quote.name: Paprika

quote.quotes: "Sometimes the person who tries to keep everyone happy is the the most lonely one."
quote.name: Makoto Ōgami

quote.quotes: "A man's come all the way out to the end of the North to ask for my help. Wouldn't it be rude to wait to hear what he wanted?"
quote.name: William Massachusetts

quote.quotes: "The sorrows of life...To not be able to live like yourself. The joys of life...To be able to die like yourself."
quote.name: Karren von Rosewald

quote.quotes: "You're young. Time is on your side. You'll grow up and I'll grow old. Someday you'll likely beat me. It's only natural. Even the strongest man must die."
quote.name: Askeladd

quote.quotes: "The present isn't everything
quote.anime: but there are things you can only do now
quote.id: things you can only find here.

quote.quotes: It's now or never. Think
quote.name: what you are going through isn’t genuine."

quote.quotes: "Smile. Even if you're facing an enemy
quote.anime: people can't attack others with a smile."

quote.quotes: "Look
quote.anime: all it means is that when I lose it
quote.id: it's cause things make no sense.  If there was any logic to it
quote.name: then I wouldn't get pissed even if I got shot or stabbed.  "

quote.quotes: "You mongrels. By our next meeting see that you've culled your numbers. Only a true hero is worthy to look upon my glorious presence. "
quote.name: Gilgamesh

quote.quotes: "A fight you can't win becomes an obsession"
quote.name: Askeladd

quote.quotes: "You taught me what it means to love
quote.anime: and for that I will be eternally grateful."

quote.quotes: "I'm the one who is grateful. That's because you're all willing to be my friends. For that
"He may seem cold-blooded
quote.anime: but he's more human and his heart is more brittle than anyone else... so much so that if you filled it with human love or betrayal
quote.id: it'd break easily... which is why I think he chose to avoid it all from the start: to love humanity. Do you understand? Not to accept it
quote.name: not to face it

quote.quotes: "They don't know that once you lose something
quote.anime: you can never get it back again."

quote.quotes: "We've never worked together before
quote.anime: so don't worry about teamwork! Just stay out of each other's way. Fight the way you want to fight!"
quote.id: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka

quote.quotes: "I'm a man who makes precise choices about time
quote.id: and people. Pleople call me Master of Choices. I'm gonna be the King of the Choices!"
quote.name: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar

quote.quotes: "Even if doesn't alter or change the end result in the slightest
quote.anime: making decisions based on convictions that you believe in and walking your own path has its own merit and worth. There's something to be said for not having... even one regret."

quote.quotes: "Those who don't fulfill their obligation to others 'ave no right to ask 'em for such privilege..."
quote.name: Mr. Blouse

quote.quotes: "I don't want to be a loser who can't do anything but talk. I don't want to be somebody who can sacrifice others
quote.id: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka

quote.quotes: "If you have enough breath to say you don't have energy
quote.anime: I haven't push you far enough!"

quote.quotes: "When you're just starting out
quote.anime: put all your energy into surviving. No matter how pathetic you feel
quote.id: or how people laugh at you
quote.name: if you come back alive

quote.quotes: "People live on by forgetting their memories. But there are some memories that should never be forgotten."
quote.name: Gendou Ikari

quote.quotes: "I understand now... What I really need to protect isn't myself
quote.anime: much less my money. It's my pride."

quote.quotes: "As for me
quote.anime: I have a lot of things that I'm not good at and that I need to work on. My comrades make up for those weaknesses by help me out
quote.id: and maybe that's how we've found a balance in our party."
quote.name: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar

quote.quotes: "If someone always follows the perfect path without ever facing hardship... Is it really what's best for that person?"
quote.name: Yoake Ryou

quote.quotes: "Life and death are like light and shadow. They're both always there. But people don't like thinking about death
quote.id: they always look away from it."
quote.name: Noragami

quote.quotes: "The only reason I must rely on this sword is because I am imperfect. A true warrior...Needs no sword"
quote.name: Thors

quote.quotes: "Tell me
quote.anime: if you have something more important than your life
quote.id: and you have to give up your life to protect that
quote.name: what would you do? In that case

quote.quotes: "Right now
quote.anime: we're all really only taking it day by day. Even if we can't get used to things
quote.id: even if we can't win at something
quote.name: even if we don't have any excess...In order to live day by day

quote.quotes: "I've continually fought
quote.anime: and with each battle I've been killing my own heart. And my heart has been completely void of feeling for quite a long time now. Maybe my life doesn't have value anymore
quote.id: but I have to keep on living. "
quote.name: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing

quote.quotes: "If you keep on hiding your true feelings
quote.anime: who is going to be happy? If you are sad
quote.id: you should say it out loud!"
quote.name: Ouran High School Host Club

quote.quotes: "If you don't face each other with honesty
quote.anime: what kind of family is this?"

quote.quotes: "They'll learn that a man without reason is no different from an animal who defecates wherever it pleases."
quote.name: Marlowe Sand

quote.quotes: "Once the thread of fate is tangled
"I can't stand the weak
quote.anime: They're always nervous about when they might next be attacked. They can't trust anybody and they never have an opinion of their own. I can't stand such people."

quote.quotes: "Living this way is my way of getting revenge!! I'm going to be living proof that your fate isn't decided at birth!! So what about you?! You're going to kill yourself
quote.anime: the ultimate act of submission. Is that how much you want to please the people who treated you like a nuisance?! Why are you trying to hurt yourself?! If your will is that strong... Then shouldn't you be able to change your fate?!"

quote.quotes: "Don't try to find a reason for somebody's love!!"
quote.name: Sengoku the Buddha

quote.quotes: "A man
quote.id: holds a whip...And beats the slave he bought with that gold as if to claim HE is the master. He just doesn't see it for himself. Every living human being is a slave to something"
quote.name: Vinland Saga

quote.quotes: "Love is more afraid of change than destruction."
quote.name: Akari Koumoto

quote.quotes: "Just because you want other people to think of you as someone who'd literally die for another... dragging someone else to his death just for that... only a bad girl would do that
"Belief in others is an illusion concocted by the clever to exploit the stupid."
quote.name: Shin Hyuga Shaing

quote.quotes: "The weather's nice and the breeze feels good. The little birds are making their cute chirping sounds. Perhaps people nowadays have forgotten how wonderful nature is... Yes
quote.anime: don't you think it's a waste to not feel it with your entire body like this? "

quote.quotes: "Even in moments of the deepest despair... I guess we can still find hope
"But... When I lost the whole foundation of my happiness in one instant
quote.anime: I realized that I was the biggest coward in the world."

quote.quotes: "We humans are miserable creatures. We reject what we fear. We attack because we don' t understand. Human cowardice... breeds war."
quote.name: Biba Amatori

quote.quotes: "If you really want to be strong... Stop caring about what your surrounding thinks of you!"
quote.name: Saitama

quote.quotes: "All day
quote.anime: I've had to sit in the stench of cigarettes and alcohol. Every single person I met today was drinking and smoking. If they weren't
quote.name: except for Wayne. I've... had enough of it."

quote.quotes: "Sometimes you have days like this. Days where the most trivial little thing... Ends up getting you wrapped up in some big
"(To Ichigo Kurosaki) You are a fool
quote.anime: Ichigo Kurosaki. You willingly seek to challenge an opponent so much more powerful than you that it strikes a primal fear into your being. Incomprehensible. If this is the work of the 'heart' that you people speak of
quote.id: then it is because you possess this 'heart' that you humans bring hurt upon yourself
quote.name: because you possess this 'heart' that you lose your lives"

quote.quotes: "Even if all we accomplished were small steps forward... We continued to give our lives if it meant that one day... humanity would be free from this terror."
quote.name: Hange Zoe

quote.quotes: "Going against the flow... takes a lot of courage. I respect that. Maybe people who can do it are just stupid
quote.anime: but... Well... What I'm sure of is that people like that are rare. So you can't call them common. You can't call them normal
quote.id: either. People like you... get called special."
quote.name: Shingeki no Kyojin

quote.quotes: "Man or Child
quote.id: None of those matter once you are out at sea!"
quote.name: One Piece

quote.quotes: "The world won't always go the way you want it to. Better not take it to seriously."
quote.name: Kubard

quote.quotes: "The one who holds power has no self-awareness of his responsibilities and the one aware of the responsibilities has no power at all."
quote.name: Arslan

quote.quotes: "Zealotry and prejudice more than anything
quote.anime: bring harm to the people of the land."

quote.quotes: "Love is not necessary
quote.anime: power is the only true necessity."

quote.quotes: "The chains of fear are easily broken with the blade of courage."
quote.name: Goltas

quote.quotes: "To force obedience by the sword now will only invite bloody rebellion later."
quote.name: Hakuei Ren

quote.quotes: "The  pain on these wounds will last only a second. The pain of your death would last a lifetime."
quote.name: Kenshiro

quote.quotes: "The Killer instinct is not perceived by words
"Yeah
quote.anime: so I don’t appear to be the brightest crayon in the box but I still look down on the rest of the world."

quote.quotes: "Still I've never thought of myself as an unfortunate person. Of course I am not a fortunate person either. In the first place a fortunate person could never write plays or novels. I write while loving my misfortune almost as if I'm tasting it."
quote.name: Takada

quote.quotes: "You can't just erase people's feelings. It's as if my emotions were lost somewhere hundreds of miles away. It's as if they were sent long ago
quote.anime: in a letter that was always intended for me."

quote.quotes: "Hope is harmony. A just heart
quote.anime: moving toward the light. That is all. Despair is hope's polar opposite. It is messy and confusing. Despair swallows up love
quote.name: and everything else. Because not knowing where you will end up is despair. Despair is what even you cannot predict. Only despair's unpredictability will save you from a boring future."

quote.quotes: "My new family is just so kind. It's almost if there's been some kind of mistake... like
quote.anime: I'll have to pay back for all this happiness later on."

quote.quotes: "What must be done... Must be done. No matter what. Complete your mission. You were born into this world so that you could complete your mission."
quote.name: Annie Leonhardt

quote.quotes: "Even if they're only a year older
quote.anime: shouldn't we respect and serve our elders?"

quote.quotes: "It seems like we spent a long time together
quote.anime: but it wasn't. It was actually pretty short. Too short. So I kind of know
quote.id: but I kind of don't know what I want to say. He was friendly
quote.name: easy to talk to

quote.quotes: "Pray not for the future. Rely not on the future or the past. Just stay in the Now."
quote.name: Miyamoto Musashi

quote.quotes: "Normally
quote.anime: as people love and are loved
quote.id: they feel happiness. When I am hated by people
quote.name: that is when I feel happiness. And then I want to tear apart and inflict unimaginable harm to the things I love. But is that really all that strange

quote.quotes: "I actually don't think something like perfection exists. That is I think why we are born able to absorb things... and by comparing ourselves with something else we can finally head in a good direction."
quote.name: Itachi Uchiha

quote.quotes: "I think I finally understand... As long as there's someone who'll grieve
quote.anime: it's wrong to want to die."

quote.quotes: "So now we know her past. So what? It doesn't have anything to do with us. We have to be nice to her just because she's had a rough past? You've got to be kidding."
quote.name: Ranta

quote.quotes: "A hero must be tough
quote.anime: strong and beautiful... As well as able to promptly and splendidly eradicate evil."

quote.quotes: "So long as I don't give up
quote.anime: the possibility of winning will never fall to zero."

quote.quotes: "This blank space represents infinite potential. One day

quote.quotes: "Well

On Tuesday

And on Sunday
forsook the world."

It is a talent that only works when the flow of energy inside of us and the flow of energy in the natural world are in perfect synchronization. To perform magic one must have a strong mind and the ability to focus. It should take over your being and come pouring out of your soul! If all we do is worry about following rules

quote.quotes: "Sometimes people put up walls

quote.id: but it’s something more superficial than most people think."

quote.quotes: "Haven't you already lifted your foot

quote.quotes: "'Because I won’t die if I miss.' I can totally understand the words of that slugger. We won’t die just because our dreams and efforts prove futile

quote.quotes: "The more fun I have

quote.quotes: "However happy or sad something is
quote.anime: you’ll soon forget it if you don’t get a chance to recall it. What people don’t realize is that they’ve forgotten about forgetting. If everyone really preserved the happiest memory from their past perfectly
quote.id: they’d only be sadder living in their relatively hollow present. And if everyone preserved the worst memory from their past perfectly
quote.name: well

quote.quotes: "Re-explaining my memories through words made good memories easier to savor

quote.quotes: "Giving people what they want only results in temporary delight

quote.quotes: "There can be no going back once you come to love someone."

quote.quotes: "Cry when you’re sad. Laugh when you’re happy. Get angry when you don’t like something. Depend on someone when you’re depressed. Care for yourself before you care for others. Don’t hate anyone. Be proud of yourself. Stay loyal when you fall in love."

quote.quotes: "Is there some rule that says I have to give up just because I was rejected?!"

quote.quotes: "Please

quote.id: people trying to cheer you up can be really annoying. 'What would you know?' 'Just leave me alone.' But what if someone you're pushing away is really worried about you? That'd be a shame."
quote.name: ReLIFE

quote.quotes: "I’d rather have my physical pain exceed my mental pain than the other way around. By hurting myself just enough
quote.anime: I could turn my attention to that."

quote.quotes: "If I abandoned you
quote.anime: I would be released from this pain. I would live on. But before long
quote.id: I would end up seeking you again
quote.name: for all my actions are ultimately devoted to you and only you. All I want is to stay on target and walk straight ahead—ignoring the losses and opposition

quote.quotes: "Life has no weight in itself; it’s a concept created by the observer that does not have a definite form. Essentially
quote.anime: life does not entail multiple instances but is just one massive wobbly lump. However
quote.id: we tend to refer to the bodies that were formed out of that giant lump as “lives”. The essence of life is in all of us and can’t be “stolen” or “born.” As long as the essence of life exists

quote.quotes: "Knowing what's in store for me means I have nothing to look forward to. If I know something good's going to happen... then when it does
quote.anime: I'm only half as happy about it because I knew in advance. And then when I know something bad is going to happen... when it does
quote.id: I get overwhelmed with this sense of defeat... and feel even worse."

quote.quotes: "After you've gobbled him down you'd be left alone to regret it while covered in blood and guts. That's the hunger of a ghoul. That's our destiny."

quote.quotes: "But there's something a little sad about them [fireworks]
quote.name: but as they fade

quote.quotes: "You should just steal the things you want."
quote.name: Five

quote.quotes: "You can erase the memories
quote.anime: but you can't erase the feelings behind them."

quote.quotes: "When surviving today is so simple and matter-of-fact people tend to forget. They forget what it means to eat a pig. They say all life is equal
quote.anime: but how much life is consumed to keep them alive everyday?"

quote.quotes: "All we can do is live while losing things."

quote.quotes: "Truth is a shy little thing. If you approach it
quote.anime: it will hide. Truth is a lonesome little thing. If you move away from it
quote.name: Princess Tutu

quote.quotes: "It's okay to live
quote.anime: even if there's no greater point to living."

quote.quotes: "People are all evil. In order to falsely believe yourself to be just
quote.anime: you must inevitably falsely believe that someone else is more evil than you."

quote.quotes: "As my fingers and toes re-grew like fingernails or hair over and over and over and over... and over again
quote.anime: every single time I got the feeling that I truly
quote.name: Tokyo Ghoul

quote.quotes: "No matter how big the place is
quote.anime: we'll eventually reach the edge if we keep moving forward!"

quote.quotes: "I don't understand what I say that makes people so mad. I don't understand how they feel. I know that's because I haven't properly socialized
quote.anime: I've tried to learn. I've tried to study up on it
quote.id: but I just don't know what's right."
