quote.quotes: "Getting kicked out of school won't kill me
quote.anime: but losing my way of life most certainly will."

quote.quotes: "Never trust anyone too much
quote.anime: remember the devil was once an angel."

quote.quotes: "Falling is just another way of flying."
quote.name: Nine

quote.quotes: "I thought that without you
quote.anime: everything would be so boring. The idea of someone else touching you... was just not okay. I only realized this recently. But I think... I've loved you for a long time
quote.name: ReLIFE

quote.quotes: "It's not that I don't trust you all. It's the opposite. I'm going because I believe in you all. You all know this well
quote.anime: right? No matter who betrays me
quote.name: SERVAMP

quote.quotes: "They've been exposed to the outside world
quote.anime: up close and personal. They've had that fear planted in them. And they've endured it. Overcome it. Each has grown from that experience... and forgotten how to hesitate."

quote.quotes: "I think it's a good thing
quote.anime: you know. You're paying attention to those around you. You don't just notice
quote.id: you take action to help. I think it's one of your strength. But don't you wonder? Is getting rid of all the thorns in someone's path really what's best for them? While they're still young enough to be allowed to trip and fall
quote.name: it's important for them to learn the pain of it and how to pick themselves up again."

quote.quotes: "I don't want to lie anymore. The words 'I believe in you' is a curse. No
quote.anime: it's a spell. If the one who hears it feels cursed
quote.name: SERVAMP

quote.quotes: "The slight difference between those who always aim for the top and those who don't... It'll come to matter in a big way once you all emerge into society."
quote.name: All Might

quote.quotes: "I'm not only allowing my comrade to continue to their deaths but I will also follow her footsteps. It's clearly a show of irresponsibility... But those that did not even intend to take the responsibility in the first place can only be called cowardly and despicable."
quote.anime: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
quote.name: Izayoi Sakamaki

quote.quotes: "I can't just leave a crying girl alone and go home. I'm too wimpy to carry you
quote.anime: but I can lend you a shoulder
quote.id: and get you down the stairs."
quote.name: ReLIFE

quote.quotes: "You don't know anything. What the hell is up with you? Trying to be the hero? Feel like some all-powerful main character? So annoying! Why? When? Where? What? How will you do and just who will you become? You're just pretending by spouting your ideals! You have nothing! You won't become someone.
"The most inflated egos are often the most fragile."
quote.name: All Might

quote.quotes: "I'm so stupid. At that time
quote.anime: I thought I could escape. I thought I'd be taken somewhere out of this world. I got my hopes up a little. But that's impossible isn't it? I'm not playing by the rules. As if anyone would just take me away when I wanted them to. I'm so stupid."

quote.quotes: "Knocking others down to gain an advantage is a fruitless endeavor. It means they've given up on winning any other way."
quote.name: Saiki Michiru

quote.quotes: "You're just too busy comparing yourself to others to see. Those comparisons aren't the only measure. Don't say it's all pointless. You've work hard and made yourself better. That's what you got in return. So don't put yourself down like this."
quote.name: Kaizaki Arata

quote.quotes: "Yeah
quote.anime: I'm being stupid.  I know that it's out of question. I know how this will end. I'll be left with nothing.  Even so
quote.name: writhe

quote.quotes: "Not taking the initiative to secure your future but just waiting for luck to come your way
quote.anime: wasn't that just the definition of being lazy?"
quote.id: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?

quote.quotes: "The only atonement you will ever realize will be that of you're own death. You will be justly and severely punished
quote.anime: before you ever find the peace you seek Kenshin. That is the meaning of 'Jinchū'. Those who live must act in the place of those who have died. YOU ARE A CRIMINAL SO DIE LIKE ONE! I will make you suffer and scream
quote.id: you took my sister... You destroyed her happiness... SUFFER KENSHIN
quote.name: DIE! YOU MISERABLE DOG!!"

quote.quotes: "I want to defeat the me that's dragging this failure around. I don't want to forget my failure. But if I carry it with me as a bad memory and keep running away
"Just as stand users attract other stand users
quote.anime: loners seems to have an ability to attract other loners as well."
quote.id: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru

quote.quotes: "However far I fall as long as there's so much as a thread left I will use it to climb. I'll take hold of it. I refuse to give up while I'm still human I can do that much. But every person must decide on his own whether to grab it."
quote.name: Ciel Phantomhive

quote.quotes: "Even if I lose my 'voice'. Even if everyone else doesn't turn up to hear me sing — as long as you're there
quote.id: that's enough. If it comes to that… I will sing
quote.name: just for you."

quote.quotes: "Whether you get mad
quote.anime: whether you laugh. The sun will set
quote.id: morning will come. Each and every time
quote.name: I'll just start over again."

quote.quotes: "If you don't believe in history... Just believe in the world you see with your own eyes."
quote.name: Frau

quote.quotes: "It's still a form of love. To those with the emotion of love
quote.name: cursing

quote.quotes: "In order to accomplish something
quote.anime: first you had to believe in yourself that you could do it."

quote.quotes: "Just because you die... doesn't mean that the people you killed will come back to life... instead using this sword to save just one more soul is repentance in true sense. "
quote.name: Kenshin Himura

quote.quotes: "A lone warrior surviving hundreds of battles
quote.name: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru

quote.quotes: "We're going to be moving forward! If we move forward
quote.name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

quote.quotes: "People do peculiar things when it comes to love... Our own safety doesn't seem so important.
"I had a lot of dreams as a child. I wanted many people to listen to the piano. I wanted to fly. I wanted to communicate with animals. Those dreams have all pretty much come true. Right now
quote.anime: I have a different dream. What mankind can imagine is what mankind can make into a reality. The imagination is a weapon. It is far superior than anything else in the world."

quote.quotes: "When there's nothing to be gained
quote.anime: rising to the challenge at those times... is surely the mark... of a true hero!!"

quote.quotes: "Trying to knock others down a peg just means lowering yourself. Don't go trampling all the hardwork and trust you've build up. It insults the effort you put in."
quote.name: Kaizaki Arata

quote.quotes: "I envy you just for having someone who's worried about you."
quote.name: Mayu

quote.quotes: "On the one hand
quote.anime: humans seek out new stimuli with insatiable desire. On the other
quote.id: they're also odd creatures that value old and very rare things."
quote.name: Gosick

quote.quotes: "Just because you're tough doesn't mean you can do whatever you want
"If you keep saving butterflies
quote.anime: spiders will starve to death! But... wanting to save them both is a contradiction. What would you rather do? Keep deliberating? The butterfly will be eaten in the meantime. "

quote.quotes: "Love does not hurt when you're loving the right person."
quote.name: Tachibana Marika

quote.quotes: "If this is the path you choose to walk... I will not interfere. But if you turn the people against you... Will you be able to function as a hero? This worries me. But if you ever get in a tight spot... I will be there."
quote.name: Genos

quote.quotes: "Heroes and villains both thrive on violence
quote.anime: but we're still categorized. 'You're good.' 'You're evil.' That's how it is!! Symbol of peace? Hah!! In the end you're just a tool for violence
quote.id: made to keep us down! And violence only breeds more violence."
quote.name: Boku no Hero Academia

quote.quotes: "You ain't gonna know unless you climb up yerself. Ain't no way to look if you don't try."
quote.name: Kotoishi Naru

quote.quotes: "It's not about wanting to do something that you can do
quote.anime: it's about what you do. It's not about wanting to become someone
quote.id: it's about who you want to become. "
quote.name: SERVAMP

quote.quotes: "It's okay if you don't understand
quote.name: and slowly come to understand."

quote.quotes: "It's ineffective to deal with many problems at once."
quote.name: Hishiro Chizuru

quote.quotes: "Life's but a waking shadow. A poor player
quote.anime: that struts and frets his hour upon the stage And then is heard no more. No matter how hopelessly they struggle in the light
quote.id: they all die without meaning. Licht-tans's piano skills are amazing
quote.name: but see... be it you or anyone

quote.quotes: "It's because we don't unterstand! It's because we don't unterstand that we wonder what the other is thinking and try desperately to unterstand every word they say... You end up thinking too much about the other person
quote.anime: and being close to them becomes painful so you try to distance yourself... I believe you become friends with somebody by doing that over and over
quote.id: and that's how... As much as I hate to admit it
quote.name: it's how I became friends with these guys."

quote.quotes: "There is no right answer for getting along. Different people require different answers."
quote.name: Kaizaki Arata

quote.quotes: "If you feel yourself hitting up against your limit remember for what cause you clench your fists... remember why you started down this path
quote.anime: and let that memory carry you beyond your limit."

quote.quotes: "Reaching out to someone is simple.  All you need is the resolve to say
quote.anime: 'I'm your ally no matter what.' 'I believe in you.' That's all the resolve you need. It's okay to make mistakes. I grew up by making mistakes. Don't have any regrets. Your justice may be completely different from someone else's. You are completely different people after all. But you still live on together. People always look for ways to do just that."

quote.quotes: "If I don't understand how a friend feels
quote.anime: am I not allowed to worry about them? If I don't experience what you do
quote.id: am I not allowed to worry about you
quote.name: my friend?"

quote.quotes: "People... are not born equal. That's the hard truth I learned at age four. But that... was my first and last setback."
quote.name: Midoriya Izuku

quote.quotes: "The role of the young is to break new ground without fear of failure. Remain in memories
quote.anime: not record books! Lose the battle
quote.name: Barakamon

quote.quotes: "No
quote.anime: order exists to protect the people. We must not aim our guns at the wrong people. What we should eliminate are our doubting hearts and minds."

quote.quotes: "If we continue on the same path
quote.anime: we are likely to meet again."

quote.quotes: "The heart moves where the heart wills."
quote.name: Twenty-Fifth Baam

quote.quotes: "The storyteller may fall silent
quote.id: but the story will not end. Be it tragedy or comedy
quote.name: as long as there is applause

quote.quotes: "We will have lost only the moment humans give up and stop fighting. As long as they keep on fighting
"What is important to survival isn't the ability to hide and protect yourself
quote.anime: it is to stand up and fight the Kabane."

quote.quotes: "Whether you win or lose... You can always come out ahead by learning from the experience."
quote.name: All Might

quote.quotes: "You couldn't save your mom because you... weren't strong enough. I didn't face the Titan... because I wasn't brave enough."
quote.name: Hannes

quote.quotes: "When things seem beyond help
quote.anime: if you open your eyes and take a really good look... It's a lot better than turning your back and hiding your eyes."

quote.quotes: "You've always seen yourself as just a normal kid
quote.id: that's exactly what you are. You're normally caring
quote.name: normally cheerful

quote.quotes: "When you fall in love with someone
quote.anime: you want everything from them. Its only natural to feel that way... but real love can only happen when you want what's best for the other person and never ask for anything in return."

quote.quotes: "It's fine if he holds bad judgements without trying to get to know me. The real point is letting just the ones who want to understand me know my real self. "
quote.name: Kyoya Ootori

quote.quotes: "I shouldn't think about losing before the match has even begun. "
quote.name: Eiichirou Maruo

quote.quotes: "Dragons are just bigger swallows."
quote.name: Assassin

quote.quotes: "Sometimes
quote.anime: it's necessary to look back at the past in order to move on to the future."

quote.quotes: "Even if you have regrets
quote.id: you must fight. If you have made the decision for yourself to fight
quote.name: to struggle

quote.quotes: "Leave people to their own thoughts
quote.anime: and sooner or later they start questioning the powers that be. If you're in a position of power
quote.id: the last thing you want folks to ask is whether or not the way things are
quote.name: is the way they have to be."

quote.quotes: "Being an actress is about satisfying people's need for fantasies...as an escape to reality. When someone is affected by the movie or drama; whether it be happiness or sadness; it is a great honor for us. "
quote.name: Mita Ratsufu

quote.quotes: "My mom always says
quote.anime: strangers are just friends you haven't met yet."

quote.quotes: "A world created through oppresing others with brute force has no meaning!"
quote.name: Yuzu Hiiragi

quote.quotes: "You need someone else to become more disciplined. No matter how hard you try by yourself
"Even if all the confidence and pride you've built over the years is blown to pieces by a major failure
quote.anime: even if you've had a soul-crushing experience
quote.id: you still have to open the shop the next day. That's who chefs are."
quote.name: Shokugeki no Sōma: Ni no Sara

quote.quotes: "I thought that would be the only way I could become the world's strongest man. But you know... It didn't work. Your heart isn't something you can get rid of. If you're trying to get rid of your heart
quote.anime: your heart is making you do it. You can never abandon everything to get stronger. The one thing you can never stop is falling in love with someone!"

quote.quotes: "The people laughing are laughing at their own ignorance."
quote.name: Sakamoto Yuuji

quote.quotes: "Liars always say the same things. 'I'll believe in you. I'll protect you. I care about you.' I'll never believe that again... No one will ever protect me. I won't even think about it. I'll fight alone
quote.id: and die alone. I know... I've felt it on my skin and in my body... That it's better not to believe in anyone than believe and be betrayed!"
quote.name: Rokka no Yuusha

quote.quotes: "Oh? What are you surprised about!? Do you think that I'm someone who would give up after being rejected just once!? Hospitalized or not
quote.anime: I shall continue to polish myself and become even moooore of a spectacular lady
quote.name: Nisekoi

quote.quotes: "Ah
quote.anime: that's right. Me hating that her hard work wouldn't be rewarded was just my secondary reason. My motivation was actually much simpler-- from the first time I met this girl
quote.id: I just wanted to see her smiling face."
quote.name: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu

quote.quotes: "I was able to become strong because I still believe those words. That a man can't become strong for revenge's sake. He becomes strong because he believes in something."
quote.name: Adlet Mayer

quote.quotes: "To enjoy my youth properly. She might've been talking about something like this. To live without thinking about consequences or what's around me with all my strength. That's what it was about..."
quote.name: Maiko Shuu

quote.quotes: "Yoshii Akihisa-kun
quote.name: tries to get back the position he deserves

quote.quotes: "Humans can lie with words. And they can deceive with actions. You can't trust their eyes
quote.id: or expressions. But when they're about to die
quote.name: their faces show the truth

quote.quotes: "I confessed you know!? Many
quote.anime: many times! Even though I knew the answer from my mouth... with my voice! I confessed you know!? Have you ever looked at Raku straight in the eyes!? Is that all you've got for Raku!? At least for the last time
quote.id: you need to be a little more truthful to yourself!! If you really liked him
quote.name: then you can't just pretend like nothing ever happened!!"

quote.quotes: "Everyone has their own talents
quote.anime: and strong wills that won't lose to anyone else."

quote.quotes: "More than anyone else
quote.anime: humanity is a species which looks forward to tomorrow. Because of their dreams
quote.id: they can bear with the unjustness of the present."
quote.name: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote.quotes: "The length of time you've been in love isn't the only thing that matters
"Once a person is ready to die
"Only humans
quote.id: are driven to solve every problem they encounter. It is how they live."
quote.name: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote.quotes: "Traditions that don't benefit people today are worthless."
quote.name: Tachibana Chika

quote.quotes: "When you are feeling sad... smile
quote.anime: even if you have to force yourself... If you cry when it gets painful... it will only get more painful."

quote.quotes: "Listen up you guys! This is the final battle! Grit your teeth and get ready to go with all your might! We're only aiming to win! It doesn't matter whether we're idiots or ordinary people or smart people! Everyone's to do whatever they can do! We're definitely... going to win this battle! Just watch
quote.anime: 3rd years...! I'm going to smash those heads of yours and show you how capable these idiots you look down on really are!"

quote.quotes: "A mission's one thing
quote.anime: but I can't put them in danger for personal reasons. The only life I can do that to is my own."
quote.id: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote.quotes: "So you feel like you're being dishonest or something? That's not true. It's a great thing to come to like someone. If you ask me... The important thing here is
quote.anime: that you have to make a clear choice between the two of them."

quote.quotes: "Humans easily betray others. That's just the nature of them."
quote.name: Wakabayashi Hatsuna

quote.quotes: "I can't let myself not like the person I like."
quote.name: Shimada Minami

quote.quotes: "To a girl
quote.anime: a man who’s nice to everyone... hm
quote.id: I suppose that works as an example
quote.name: to a man

quote.quotes: "I won't come to hate you! Never! Regardless of what happens in the future!"
quote.name: Tachibana Marika

quote.quotes: "People don't simply disappear from this world when they die. They only truly die when they are forgotten by those who are alive. That's why it doesn't matter whether I lived or died. No one knows of my existence
quote.anime: and I don't have I don't have a single friend. But... if you all won't forget about me... that is enough even if I die. With just that... I would be more alive than I ever have been."

quote.quotes: "The most important thing when fighting and running away is to defend. It is not about beating the enemy in front of them
quote.anime: but to retreat while buying time for their comrades to retreat."

quote.quotes: "Someone who can be deceived by others will be deceived again and again."
quote.anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
quote.name: Lelei la Lelena

quote.quotes: "Why did you run away
quote.anime: Chitoge-chan? No... I don't want this... I won't be happy with you just giving up... To end up liking the same person. It's painful
quote.name: you like him enough to not be able to face him again after that

quote.quotes: "Don't forget
quote.anime: our existence is a fragile and uncertain one
quote.id: knowing that any one of us could die at any moment. In this short time that we have
quote.name: we all have one or two wishes that we'd like to fulfill. Losing the most important wish... is like losing your reason for living."

quote.quotes: "The dead can't talk."
quote.name: Sakamoto Yuuji

quote.quotes: "Girls are happier when they're the only one you're nice to."
quote.anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
quote.name: Rory Mercury

quote.quotes: "Holding in your own feelings like that... ye think tha' no one's gonna get hurt since ye're not lettin' it show to anyone? Tha's just the same as goin' 'round hurting everyone anyway!! What ye're doin' isn't ye keepin' everyone dear to ye!! Ye're just protectin' yerself!!! Ye're just 'fraid of gettin' hurt! Losin' yer nerve! Ye're just scared!!"
quote.name: Tachibana Marika

quote.quotes: "You don't call someone a friend when they just remember you. You're friends because you like each other."
quote.name: Kazumi Schlierenzauer

quote.quotes: "...Don't treat me as a fool
quote.anime: you pervert woman ...Why do I have to prioritize you over my friends?"

quote.quotes: "Battle was a thing which was won by living and which was lost by dying."
quote.anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
quote.name: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote.quotes: "Once you find out whom you made the promise to
quote.anime: will you really be able to fall in love with her?"

quote.quotes: "Only a foolish human would attempt to rationalize emotion."
quote.name: Makina

quote.quotes: "Most of the winning results in war is caused by pursuit. Do you know why? Leaving aside modern times
quote.anime: it seems during the era of bayonet warfare
quote.name: arise from the moments when the losing side is being pursued."

quote.quotes: "If you don’t have the resolve to take responsibility for her until the very end
quote.id: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote.quotes: "It's just... a love that's continued for many years without straying is something that
quote.id: is beautiful and impossible to fault. But... Though it may be short
quote.name: and it may be something that's become crooked and bent partway through

quote.quotes: "Those who are granted great power lose all self-restraint when among the weak. Oranges don't start out rotten. It's the container that makes them rot."
quote.name: Onodera

quote.quotes: "If she lost because of a difference in ability
quote.anime: it can’t be helped. If she worked hard and didn’t get what she wants
quote.id: she can just work harder next time. If she gave her all for this
quote.name: it’s acceptable even if she lost."

quote.quotes: "Some questions with no answers cannot be answered even by those who live forever. Yet
quote.anime: the absence of a correct answer does not mean the question cannot be answered. If you want to know how I felt about the complete ban on some culture and art that I could not understand
quote.name: or could not accept

quote.quotes: "You have no intention of reciprocating my daughter's feelings
quote.anime: do you? So what gives you the right to speak in that way? Perhaps you wish to appease your guilty conscience. Would you not call that 'hypocrisy'?"

quote.quotes: "Aki
quote.anime: you can't lie when you confess to someone. I'm trying to comfort you know
quote.id: but if I just wanted to comfort you
quote.name: I won't confess to you. I confessed to you like this because I really like you. But I do find it a little annoying how you fidget around like this

quote.quotes: "If a member of one’s family is killed by a thief
quote.anime: then one should hate the thief. But people will miss aim their hatred — why should they go to where the thief hides? If one loses a family member to sickness
quote.id: then one should hate the disease. It is not the doctor’s fault; yet people will hate the doctor."
quote.name: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote.quotes: "I'll tell you a way that I heard to figure out if you like someone or not. Imagine
quote.id: when you found a shooting star
quote.name: when you found a cafe you like

quote.quotes: "Men select women based on emotion. Even if there's a reason
quote.id: women select men based on reason. Either by something like his class ranking or his standing in society."
quote.name: Brynhildr in the Darkness

quote.quotes: "Killing for your own ideas... even a bandit could do that if it's killing a complete stranger. However
quote.anime: it's a completely different thing when it comes to killing a relative or a friend. Desire alone isn't enough. You need indomitable will and unwavering beliefs."

quote.quotes: "There's no need to worry about trivial things like vocal rights or working together. If nobody's going to accept me
quote.id: whether it's by threat or by assassination. This is my-- our F class modus operandi."
quote.name: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu

quote.quotes: "People can face tomorrow because they can see reality and accept it. By denying reality
quote.id: and tomorrow will never come. No
quote.name: you can cloud it up

quote.quotes: "You are too young to worry about failure. In a pinch
quote.anime: just muddle through. The outcome won't change
quote.name: One Punch Man

quote.quotes: "I'm sorry for not saying this to you
quote.anime: Akihisa-kun. I know I shouldn't hide this from you
quote.id: but I was wondering whether I should tell you this. Because if I told you that
quote.name: you'll definitely tell me 'you should go'

quote.quotes: "Revenge is a rite that restores one’s spirit after it has been ravaged by the anger and hatred of loss. That is the only way to heal one's soul and stand up again to face reality. That is the only way we can have a tomorrow."
quote.anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
quote.name: Yao Ro Ducy

quote.quotes: "Who decides limits? And based on what? You said you worked hard? Well
quote.anime: maybe you need to work a little harder. Is that really the limit of your strength? Could the you of tomorrow beat you today? Instead of giving in
quote.name: One Punch Man

quote.quotes: "This is a case of personal feelings: there's no way to force someone into saying that he or she loves someone. Besides
quote.anime: only the person knows whether the love truly exists. Even if it's said out with false feelings
quote.id: it'll just cause damage on both sides.

quote.quotes: "Trying to change someone else's thinking is sheer arrogance."
quote.anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
quote.name: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote.quotes: "Why do you have to pay money to eat?! Can't we all just share?! Where is freedom in the world?! All are slaves to labor!! The rich grow fat... While the poor die!!"
quote.name: Hammerhead

quote.quotes: "Pawns? Isn't that such an ugly term to use? We should call them the foundation for our futures. But it's a fact that they'll be sacrificed."
quote.name: Sakamoto Yuuji

quote.quotes: "Did you know? If a colony of ants gets rid of the laziest one
quote.anime: another one will just start being lazy instead?"
quote.id: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote.quotes: "You may be able to get stronger with simply the right attitude. In other words
quote.anime: train your spirit before worrying about strength through power and technology."

quote.quotes: "If so many people believe in this
quote.anime: the lies will become reality. That's the so called group mentality."

quote.quotes: "Sometimes
quote.anime: you’ll run into a situation which is dangerous
quote.id: but which you can't run from. Sometimes
quote.name: you know you’ll lose

quote.quotes: "In exchange for gaining strength
quote.anime: have I lost something more important as a human being? Emotions used to swirl within me when I fought. Fear
quote.name: anger... But now... Day after day

quote.quotes: "We teachers have to be role models for you students. If we can’t face you all head on
"It is a shame for a knight to have one's trust in him withdrawn halfway."
quote.anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
quote.name: Gray Co Aldo

quote.quotes: "There would be no happier death than being killed by the woman I love."
quote.name: Kurosu Etsurou

quote.quotes: "No matter what
quote.anime: anyone would hate to be weak as they get plundered. But if there's a chance
quote.id: even if humans fail to get what they want
quote.name: they can unexpectedly accept such an outcome."

quote.quotes: "Deceive your other self. Deceive the world. That is what you must do to reach the Steins Gate. Good Luck. El Psy Congroo."
quote.name: Okabe Rintarou

quote.quotes: "What we cannot speak about
quote.anime: we must pass over in silence."

quote.quotes: "I’ve always been wondering
quote.anime: even though you’ve been treating me carefully like a princess
quote.id: are you just trying to keep your distance away from me? You praise me so much and belittle yourself
quote.name: so I feel that you’re trying to keep your distance away from me..."

quote.quotes: "Bonds are what they are because they can be cut."
quote.name: Miyaichi Rio

quote.quotes: "No matter what painful things happens
quote.anime: even when it looks like you'll lose... when no one else in the world believes in you... when you don't even believe in yourself... I will believe in you!"

quote.quotes: "When people focus on what they want to do
quote.anime: they’ll show off an inexplicable charm."

quote.quotes: "Don't you ever worry about it? Wonder if there's something wrong with you? When you're always alone... you start comparing yourself with others. You want to make sure you're normal. But... when you're around lots of people
quote.anime: you don't compare yourself with them. You want to be yourself. It's okay to be weird... You want to be special. That's how it balances out."

quote.quotes: "If it's almost there
quote.anime: it means it's still not complete."

quote.quotes: "Whether you're alive
quote.id: or living dead... Loneliness is still loneliness... It's the same thing... Nothing changes. There are no different categories of loneliness. It's just loneliness."
quote.name: Ana Satsujin

quote.quotes: "Ever since that fiery night

quote.quotes: "There are many ways of thinking as there are people."

quote.quotes: "Well I do have abilities you haven't yet been given

quote.quotes: "Look. Look at me! Watch as the man you cast out spills his blood and dies. Take a nice long look! I will save you all. I want you to live the rest of your lives knowing the man you abandoned saved you. And I will laugh at you from the afterlife. And tell you that it serves you right!"

quote.name: I say assassination is education. The assassination classrooms teacher will get stronger every time he teaches!"

quote.quotes: "Isn't the foolishness of the few a more precious commodity than the wisdom of the masses? There are those who were born human but harbor wishes that man was not meant for and have renounced their humanity in its pursuit."

quote.quotes: "Just 'cause you're a girl
quote.anime: it doesn't mean you have to wait for a prince to come along on a white horse. You can go out and find Prince Charming yourself. It is up to you to find the right boy."

quote.quotes: "There are two kinds of arrogance. One where you are unequal to the task and one where your dreams are too big. The former is commonplace stupidity... but the latter is a rare species that is difficult to find.
"We're not Demons or Gods. We're just humans."

quote.quotes: "Why are you acting like you're the only one hurting when you pushed him away?"

quote.quotes: "If you're helping someone and expecting something in return

quote.anime: I never even felt the need to use my ability to help others. All I ever wanted was the normal life I couldn't have. I've finally achieved what I always wanted."

quote.quotes: "Death is to good for trash like you. This is your punishment which is even harder than death. Atone for your sin by living... A life of fulfillment."

quote.quotes: "A prison
quote.anime: you say? You think you'll be free if you go to the world above? A girl like you can never be free no matter where you go. After all
quote.id: we humans are apes put in a cage called Earth. There is no difference between the world above and the world below. The only difference is which is bigger or smaller. People who pout about how confining the cage is can never be happy. They live their lives only seeing the iron bars. A true lack of freedom is when you cage your soul."

quote.quotes: "Relationships do not always improve... Sometimes they decline... But... it still counts as a victory if it all works out in the end... Let’s keep it at that..."

quote.quotes: "Every single one of them died while furiously giving off the light that resided within them and that light is then inherited by the next person where it will go on to shine with an even greater radiance. And thus people are connected together... allowing us to work towards a better tomorrow. "

quote.anime: the water would be stagnant. If I were to name the ripples on the water surface….Would it be happiness? Or anger? No. For this ocean

Then swim downwards while enduring the icy deep kicking through the cold and heavy ocean waters. If I truly want to know the human known as myself….even if.. there is nothing there."

quote.quotes: "Those who underestimate their enemies will not last long in this world."

I can end my journey surrounded by so many people

quote.quotes: "You yourself have to change first

quote.anime: hiding myself within  a safe cage

quote.quotes: "Don't ever think there's any perfect society made by humans!! If you think that way you'll overlook the enemy!! Don't be fooled by appearances!!

quote.quotes: "'Hero of Justice? A world where no one is hurt?' Don't be absurd. 'Humanity' is the name for an animal that cannot find joy in life without sacrifice. quote.quotes: "Someone saying that they are happy doesn't necessarily mean that they are happy

quote.quotes: "Romance can strengthen people

quote.quotes: "We fail. We make mistakes. But each time we do

quote.quotes: "However

quote.quotes: "When you're really in trouble
quote.anime: of course I'd come and help.

quote.quotes: That's what friends are for

quote.anime: I don't want to do. You may feel that I'm currently an abnormal Nagato Yuki. That judgement is correct. But I myself cannot accept that I am abnormal... because if I do
quote.id: I'll become alone. I was scared
quote.name: so I tried to hide it."

quote.quotes: "When you pick the only option you have to choose from

quote.quotes: "Love is a bitter sweet taste of life

quote.quotes: "Sovereignty means absolutely nothing in front of me. "

quote.quotes: "If one feels it is fun now
quote.anime: one will be able to enjoy life the most. Everything will change over time

quote.quotes: "If training hard can make you number one

quote.quotes: "It isn't just 'others'. Not 'others'. It's my Family. I'll force my ideals on my family. And since they're family
quote.anime: I'll lie to them. I'll deceive them. I'll cause them trouble. I'll make them worry. I'll owe them things
quote.id: things I'll never be able to repay. However
quote.name: I think that's okay. If you say that being an impostor is evil

quote.quotes: "I don't like this

quote.anime: they'll never do it again. But I don't feel like starting a conversation either
quote.id: since in the direction I ought to look
quote.name: there are only people who I cannot talk to. That's why I look at the sky... It's strange how merely observing things can be so handy to kill time. It hurts that I get called a weirdo just for making a habit out of it and in the end it just makes me stare at the sky even more. I've probably always been like this. Thinking about it

quote.quotes: "People are born into this world. And people are taken from this world."

quote.quotes: "If you don't believe in yourself
quote.anime: who will!? You're the only one demeaning yourself!"

quote.quotes: "You can’t take back the answer you already gave out. There’s no use in crying over spilt milk. The egg you broke won’t come back. All the horses and soldiers of a king will never return to his side again.
It doesn’t matter what was said. You can never wipe away a bad impression.
Even though the opposite is so simple in comparison. Just one word will make someone appear hateful. Just doing one thing would make you seem hateful.
That’s why excuses are meaningless. Because even those excuses will make you look hateful."

quote.quotes: "Identity? What? The people who yap about identities all the time are usually the ones with no identity. Like something that changes so easily could really be an 'identity'

quote.quotes: "I want to beat them. Even though I'm not cool

quote.quotes: "Even though I'm bitter over losing
quote.name: and my eyes are smeared with tears...even though I've never felt worse...I wonder why the stars are sparkling like this. The scent of the music room in his hair. I can hear his slightly ragged breathing. His shoulder

quote.quotes: "Whatever. It's okay
quote.anime: isn't it? Being dishonest with your feelings is part of who you are. If that would just suddenly change overnight

quote.name: you won't notice you've hurt them. What's important is your awareness of it. It's because you care about them

quote.quotes: "Don't put me on their level. I don't care about looking interesting. I'm just self-conscious."

quote.quotes: "Step one foot outside

quote.id: or looking back... There just might be something important there. You may have lost something. There may be the smile of a loved one. Isn't it impotant to try looking around once in a while? That's how it was for me. I could only ever face forward

"Sorry

quote.quotes: "If you come across an event that's too good to be true

quote.anime: the 'fear' experience is a little different from yours

quote.name: right? But I'm afraid of what I've already lost."

quote.quotes: "So everyone just pretends to understand... and pretends to be understood."

quote.quotes: "People's thoughts don't always mirror how they feel. That's why they sometimes make decisions that seem nonsensical."

"Listen
quote.anime: even if someone is suffering before you

quote.quotes: "What are people? What is the 'self'? So long as you look like someone else

quote.quotes: "People's thoughts

quote.anime: it's only natural for one to want to stop the time while they're still blossoming in all full glory."

quote.quotes: "Being able to forget things you want to forget
quote.anime: and being able to remember things you want to remember
quote.name: you know?"

FB saved me with a single message. I didn't care if it was a joke or not. I was just happy that somebody knew... that I was alive... that it was OK for me to live..."

quote.quotes: "Applying knowledge is of the utmost importance when studying. You wrestle with various things and come up with a solution from there. It's true that asking someone who knows the answer is the quickest. But you can't necessarily say that that's the best way
"Overall
quote.anime: I think people tend to reveal their true selves when they step into an avatar. As I said earlier
quote.id: they probably feel some sense of freedom. But freedom easily gained quickly turns into a false sense of omnipotence.

quote.quotes: "Everyone lives their own way. Whether you live for yourself or live for others... that is your own decision. A life of earnestly protecting and tending to someone isn't bad either. Though it's not that glorious of a life."

quote.quotes: "Stop running! I know. Even if you find the kids
quote.anime: you might not be able to help them. Maybe something could happen that can never unhappen. That scares you

quote.name: you hate being alone

quote.quotes: "I don't like sparklers all that much. It burns so beautifully for just a little while and when it's done

quote.quotes: "You probably do lose a lot

quote.quotes: "I wasn’t scared that I’d be rejected
quote.anime: I was scared that if I said how I felt

quote.quotes: "Most people don’t mind killing cows and chickens but they’d probably have a hard time doing the same to chimpanzees. Partially
quote.anime: it’s because chimpanzees bear a slight resemblance to humans
quote.id: but the primary reason is that they can draw pictures. Suppose fish were able to draw pictures. Even if we are unable to understand what they’re thinking
quote.name: it becomes harder to kill animals that can draw. Instinctively

quote.quotes: "What is there
quote.anime: over there? There is nothing. I was born in a bottom of a pit where no light shone. As if pressed together by the darkness. Untouched by everything at all. Born under those dark
quote.id: dark sediments. I had a white form. My comrades were all in pure black. In those black forms with their eyes shining and teeth baring they were certainly eating something. And then... There was nothing to me
quote.name: except my eyes. I felt nothing. No rather... It was possible that what I felt was 'void'

quote.quotes: "Fear is proof that your imagination is functioning. Frankly
quote.anime: I feel bad for anyone who can't feel fear. Without imagination
quote.id: you can never deduce which action to take next."
quote.name: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei

quote.quotes: "Just because someone's friends with a nice person doesn't mean they're nice
Sometimes they're friends because the person's nice enough to have them."

quote.quotes: "There's some skill involved in the creation of anything. That skill is like a map made of the failures people have made in the past and learned from. That map can guide people. If you follow a certain route you'll fail. However
quote.anime: if you follow a different route you'll succeed. You can make something just by following the map. It will take form. It might be very hard task to walk the way others have told you. But if you have the will
quote.id: it might turn out to be easy. But if you follow the path created by others
quote.name: you'll eventually have to stop somewhere. Then what will you do? Will you create a new path for yourself? Or will you wait until someone creates one for you? Either one is fine. Stopping or moving forward. Because the path you'll follow is something you have to choose for yourself."

quote.quotes: "I probably won't be able to look forward to summer for a long time. My chest will hurt. My tears will be overflowing. But this warmth in my hands and these summer memories will live on in my heart."

quote.quotes: "Nothing interesting ever happens. It's the same everyday."

quote.quotes: "If this is all it takes to tear us apart
quote.anime: then maybe we weren't all that close to begin with."

quote.quotes: "(In Gamma worldline
quote.id: even if we were enemies in the world you were before
quote.name: right now I'm your only ally. Even if the whole world turned against you

quote.quotes: "Everything you've been taught is based on theories and logic. Soon you will likely come to realize how pointless they are in the world we live in.
"Exams are an opportunity to teach correctly the meaning of winning and losing
quote.anime: of strong and weak. Students soak up heaping helpings of successes and setbacks! Take in now what it means to win
quote.name: Assassination Classroom

quote.quotes: "When I realized
quote.anime: I was already on the roof of a building. ...I had come to hate everything. I was sick of sitting in my room holding my knees too. If nobody was going to notice or care if I died then... what's the point in living?"

quote.quotes: "Even now
quote.anime: twenty centuries after the death of Christ
quote.id: the world is a long way from peace."

quote.quotes: "People are weak. Because of their weakness
quote.anime: they sometimes behave in ways devoid of self-respect. But then

quote.quotes: "Don't you think it's futile to live in fear of death? I mean
quote.anime: everyone is going to die sometime
quote.id: so is there any point in pretending not to see it for the present? Or instead

quote.quotes: "Tests are a good thing. The knowledge gained from a night of cramming will be all but forgotten once you hit adulthood. And that's fine. The experience you gain through competition
quote.anime: having sharpened your skills and broadened your minds all under the same set of rules? That's the real treasure."

quote.quotes: "Suppose someone said 'humans are foolish'... Obviously
quote.anime: that person would be talking about themselves as well. If you want to understand human beings
quote.id: you need to do more than just watch them. You need to pay attention to what they themselves are watching. What are you watching? You are the ones who I'm watching. It may be hard to believe
quote.name: but I like you guys. You know what they say... The opposite of love is not hatred

quote.quotes: "It’s dangerous for them to grow up without experiencing true competition. Because they’ll keep whining
quote.anime: even without taking the matter seriously. For those with a high level of aptitude... The sooner they know the frustration of defeat
quote.id: the greater their growth will be."
quote.name: Assassination Classroom

quote.quotes: "People have many things pent up inside of themselves."

quote.quotes: "Do you know how they say that love is like a dream? With a dream
quote.anime: you eventually wake up from it. It's hard to force yourself to wake up."

quote.quotes: "Have you ever thought about why you're so good and your parents are so bad? If you'd so kindly let me give away the answer; it's because even if you're cheating on someone or you're being cheated on
quote.anime: everyone laughs at bad jokes and eats over-sweet boiled vegetables."

quote.quotes: "Become an idol who can laugh through the bitterness. If you do that
"Taking responsibility for yourself is the first condition for humanity. One who cannot do even that is less than human. Just a dog
"Chains can be torn off. Your sister knew that. Be it an artificially produced human or a wild animal stained by sin... I believe that all living things have the right to be happy."

quote.quotes: "Please remember that there are times to take someone's hand and lead them along... But also times when you must be stern and let them fend for themselves. "
quote.name: Korosensei

quote.quotes: "We all have our scars from loving someone too deeply
quote.anime: from wanting to protect  someone too much."

quote.quotes: "If one really wants to change the world...they have to do it by their own hands!"

quote.quotes: "If you try to acquire something
quote.anime: you'll lose something else along the way. That's the truth of this world. No matter how sad it is."

quote.quotes: "When a person is hard to reach
quote.anime: someone has to extend their hand to that person to get to them
quote.name: because they dream that freedom really exists

quote.quotes: "There's something you can't see unless you're standing at the top

You want some nice guy to be a part of your life but only if its on your terms. All this talk of just being friends with a guy... don't make me laugh!"

quote.quotes: "In the end

quote.quotes: "It's impossible to share everything. No one can become someone else. It's natural to envy someone who's more wealthy or who has higher standing. That's how conflicts begin. However
quote.id: relying on whatever someone provided without thinking
quote.name: and only seeing things as 'black' or 'white' with such overly simplified thinking... Isn't that a sin as well? People need to think for themselves. For this reason

quote.id: then you are essentially breaking a promise to yourself. Its like a breach of contract

quote.quotes: "I'm sure it's not wrong for people to want to understand each other. And even if it is
quote.anime: I want us to understand each other."

quote.quotes: "Question: Why can one keep living as a hikikomori?
Answer: Because one's food
quote.anime: clothing and shelter are assured. It's because one is permitted a lukewarm bare minimum of a life that one can keep living as a hikikomori indefinitely. Being able to live as a hikikomori was in itself very much a luxury. Without the assurance of food
quote.name: unless you're prepared to die

quote.quotes: "All truth is meaningless. In the end

If all those things go beyond time to create 'you'... ...then that would be magnificent. So don't think of it as letting me die. Even if the world line changes

quote.name: Kino No Tabi

Why hasn't everyone realized this already..."

quote.name: but when the answer you worked hard to discover is right

quote.quotes: "There are things that you can only learn by facing the unknown

quote.quotes: "In all things

quote.quotes: "You're free to like or hate whoever you want."

quote.name: unfortunately

Living is continuing to search. Living is eating. Living is continuing to fight. Living is being lost. Living is preparing oneself."

quote.quotes: "That’s right. Worried about being discovered

quote.name: or you're a great fighter

quote.quotes: "I won’t lose to my own decisions

quote.name: and the memory of my cellphone. Over the past few years

quote.quotes: "Because we can’t understand each other

quote.quotes: "Even if they're not your own child

quote.name: Mushishi

quote.quotes: "I may be unreliable

quote.quotes: "When you want to scream or cry

quote.quotes: "Even if you think I’m a nuisance

quote.quotes: "I don’t want to waste a single second or meter. From your first step and second of the day

quote.quotes: "You meet someone and then part ways. It’s a natural part of the human experience. No one can promise they’ll be together forever."

quote.quotes: "If you don’t interact with the people around you

quote.quotes: "I have to be her place to belong. I need to be a steady
quote.anime: reliable man whom she can trust."

quote.quotes: "Aren’t we family? Aren’t I like your family too? So it’s okay to cry if you’re having a hard time. Then I’ll do anything to help."

quote.quotes: "As long as I can be with you
quote.anime: I dont care what anyone says or how much I’m detested. As long as I can be with the one I love
quote.id: that alone makes it okay. That’s what I longed for."
quote.name: Kimi no Iru Machi

quote.quotes: "In this world
quote.anime: there are things you’re better off not knowing."

quote.quotes: "It may be better to go and regret it rather than staying here and regretting it. If you don’t move forward
"I’m a very lucky person. I was able to meet people I love."
quote.name: Noumi Kudoryafuka

quote.quotes: "No matter what
quote.anime: I’ll be always be your friend. No matter how far you go
quote.id: I’ll be thinking about you everyday."

quote.quotes: "Only a genuine wish makes one's own soul shine beautifully in this life. That light is a messenger from heaven lighting the way for our unwavering souls to be brought to the God's side."

quote.quotes: "No one dies alone. When someone dies
quote.anime: the part of them that lives inside someone else also dies. You already live inside me."

quote.quotes: "I don’t believe in crap like coincidence
quote.name: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru

quote.quotes: "I don’t want to change. I want to change. We all hold in our hearts conflicting feelings
quote.anime: each back to back. And so
quote.name: Tamako Market

quote.quotes: "The others taught me something. That one needn't fear the future. That one needn't hate the world. From now on
quote.anime: the world will not simply be my fantasy. It will be our one and only

quote.quotes: "People say that if you fight
quote.anime: it means you're close to someone; but in the end
quote.id: a fight is just a collision of egos. People don't learn to understand each other just by laying bare their feelings."

quote.quotes: "It’s like an automated vending machine for canned juice. You’ll get what you want so long as you have the money
quote.anime: but… You get nothing in return without it. You can’t buy your way into the hearts of others.

quote.quotes: "There are two things people fear... those are death and embarrassment. Those who try to overcome death are just idiots
quote.anime: but I won't laugh at those who try to overcome their embarrassment. I like those kind of idiots."

quote.quotes: "Something that's supposed to die and doesn't will eventually rot away
quote.anime: whether it's a man or a nation."

quote.quotes: "Life is short so it will be appreciated. We live to our fullest due to that.
"There certainly are things that cannot be told in words
quote.anime: but that can only be said by people who have exhausted their use of words. Words are like icebergs that are floating on the ocean called 'heart'. The parts that show above the sea surface are small
quote.id: but they still let us perceive the larger parts that are hidden below the water. Use words deliberately. If you do
quote.name: you'll be able to convey more things more accurately than if you were to keep silent. Right judgement can only be made with right information and right analyses."

quote.quotes: "You don't need to make a hundred friends. Just make real friends that you care about a hundred times as much. Even if you only have one
quote.anime: so long as they’re a friend you really care about."

quote.quotes: "If what you lost was too big and you can’t replace it with something else
quote.anime: you don’t have to replace it with just one thing
quote.id: right? If you get ten small things or a hundred small things
quote.name: all together it will be enough of a reason for you to keep going!"

quote.quotes: "We have to change our way of thinking if we really want to change the future."

quote.quotes: "Everyone's fighting for their own kind of freedom. It seems small; but in their hearts
quote.anime: nothing is more important. With such hopes
quote.id: I won't have enough time for revenge or fear

quote.quotes: "I don’t mind getting in trouble. But I won’t let my friends' kindness go to waste."

quote.quotes: "Every story has an ending. One day
quote.anime: we won’t be able to stay together."

quote.quotes: "People get corrupted. Not even saints and heroes are safe. There's nothing you can do to prevent it. That's our salvation."

quote.quotes: "Of the days that I have lived
quote.anime: only those I spent with you seemed real."

quote.quotes: "There are times when there's a great pleasure waiting at the end of laments

quote.quotes: "Even at a time like this there's not a single word of rescue from the one you worship. You see? That is the truth of this world. He doesn't watch anything and doesn't save anyone."

quote.quotes: "If things were to change
quote.anime: do you think you could ever fall in love with me? Or fulfill a dream for which I long? The world is about to change. That's why I'm here now. I've come and this will mean a new beginning for my life."

quote.quotes: "It’s not that I’m a tolerant person. I just don’t want to think about these troublesome things."

quote.quotes: "He realized that he had lost sight of something important. No matter what turn he took he should have kept singing. Even if his songs couldn’t save the world

quote.quotes: "What defines humans... Defines us? Nobody will notice a change on the inside if you look the same on the outside."

quote.quotes: "You’d better not (rip my mask). Like Pandora’s box
quote.anime: you want to open it because you don’t know what’s inside. But if you know what’s inside before you open it… It’s boring

quote.quotes: "It is called the memories of the body. When the mind forgets

quote.quotes: "I understand your feelings of wanting to bring the bad guy to justice

quote.quotes: "The right thing is… to have faith in life

quote.anime: for the same reason… Black is the color I hate too.

quote.name: Brynhildr in the Darkness

quote.quotes: "If it's this world behind the eyelids

quote.name: Detective Conan

quote.quotes: Entrusting our bodies to the Earth’s love

quote.quotes: That day
quote.id: we entrusted the beginning of the world to those reverberations… Remember that brilliance."

quote.quotes: "They'll use you as much as they want; then once they're done with you

quote.anime: you will discover the path to dreams. When one finds death
