quote.quotes: "Stealing someone's name is never all right. It means you're unwilling to recognize them as human."
quote.name: Shiroe

quote.quotes: "A student who is too loyal to his master has no chance of surpassing that master... A mutinous spirit is the source of independence."
quote.name: Boris Konev

quote.quotes: "I can’t even imagine a world without Light."
quote.name: Misa Amane

quote.quotes: "If you need to run
quote.anime: you should run the best you can! Then you can just take your time to think."

quote.quotes: "I'd rather be a pig than a fascist."
quote.name: Porco Rosso

quote.quotes: "A pig that doesn't fly is just a pig."
quote.name: Porco Rosso

quote.quotes: "When I saw you
quote.anime: I just wanted to find a way to protect you."

quote.quotes: "Human beings are dangerous. If we're seen
quote.anime: we have to leave. My parents said so."

quote.quotes: "[his parting words to Arrietty] My heart is stronger now
"Sometimes you have to fight for the things that are worth fighting for."
quote.name: Arrietty

quote.quotes: "When the afternoon air currents mix
quote.anime: we can even touch the stars without fear!"

quote.quotes: "I'm no man's burden! I want to be of use!"
quote.name: Shizuku Tsukishima

quote.quotes: "The reason the Yamadas get along fine is because all three adults are nuts. If one of you were normal it would unbalance the rest."
quote.name: Noboru Yamada

quote.quotes: "The weak always cling to words
quote.anime: and those with power die for those without it."

quote.quotes: "Tell you what… I’ll carve you up until you find yourselves cursing the fact that you have such resilient bodies."
quote.name: Riful

quote.quotes: "From the moment I first saw you
quote.anime: you’ve looked so sad. Your face shows so much pain. Your eyes were like mine. They looked so sad
quote.name: so lonely… as if you couldn’t stand it."

quote.quotes: "We're going to explore the outside world someday
quote.name: land made of ice

quote.quotes: "People are crazy for believing that these walls will protect us forever. Even though the walls have been intact for the past 100 years
quote.anime: there’s nothing that can guarantee they won’t be broken down today…"

quote.quotes: "You're not God
quote.anime: nor are you a sister. But it's because I feel that you're much closer to me than God
quote.id: I'm much more afraid of being hated by you."
quote.name: Akuma To Love Song

quote.quotes: "Lies are like colours. The more you pile up
"What takes reason a hundred years to build a bridge to only takes the wings of faith a single night to reach."
quote.name: Shionji Yuuko

quote.quotes: "(Her dad) He'd always tell me that family isn't about being related by blood. Living under the same roof and caring for each other is what family is all about."
quote.name: Charunee Kusakabe

quote.quotes: "Ever since I was little
quote.anime: I've always been curious. Why doesn't the witch
quote.id: who can use her magic to transform a shabby girl into someone lovely
quote.name: cast a spell on herself? If she used her magic on herself

quote.quotes: "I despise myself... because others are too kind to me..."
quote.name: Yuichi Onodera

quote.quotes: "As long as the kindness received from others... is returned back
quote.anime: it's fine even if it takes time."

quote.quotes: "There are always chances in life."
quote.name: Isogi Toshio

quote.quotes: "I think that what people who've committed crimes need isn't punishment
quote.anime: but rather the knowledge of the pain of being forgiven."

quote.quotes: "Every girl is born a princess
quote.anime: some of them just forget is all."

quote.quotes: "Anyone can say that he likes himself best. When you say that you like someone
quote.anime: you just end up liking yourself in the moment of being with that person
quote.name: Akuma To Love Song

quote.quotes: "I think that no one wants to see others' sins."
quote.name: Yuusuke Kanda

quote.quotes: "It’s the most powerful words in the world. No just argument or eloquence can stand a chance against it. It’s… ”So what?”"
quote.name: Yang Wenli

quote.quotes: "Even if the clothes are too large in the beginning
quote.anime: they’ll fill out as you grow. The same goes for courage… The secret of not getting killed by the enemy is to underestimate life’s difficulties."

quote.quotes: "My role is to darken souls
quote.id: until they become pitch black. By doing so
quote.name: you can stay beautiful and shine bright

quote.quotes: "You disappointed me. So I have to give you a punishment. Regret your helplessness and feel despair."
quote.name: Makishima Shougo

quote.quotes: "So how long will it be
quote.anime: then? How long before you're no longer cursed to walk the earth...?"

quote.quotes: "So laugh... demon... Laugh that arrogant laugh of yours... And remember
"I want nothing more than to be a bayonet; a bayonet wielded by the hand of God. I would have been happy to be born a storm
quote.anime: or a divine threat; a mighty explosion or even a terrible hurricane. A divine force of nature without heart or pity. And if this relic can transform me into such a thing...then I am happy to abandon my humanity."

quote.quotes: "Hold your tongue
"Your voice sounds so lovely when you're whimpering in agony."
quote.name: Alexander Anderson

quote.quotes: "If anyone does not love the Lord Jesus Christ
quote.anime: let them be accursed at His coming. God save you from your fate. Amen!"

quote.quotes: "What are humans’ desires? What I think the most troublesome desire is the desire for attention. It’s the source of jealousy and relationship problems
"Providence may guide a man to meet one specific person
quote.anime: even if such guidance eventually leads him to darkness. Man simply cannot forsake the beauty of his own chosen path. When will man learn a way to control his soul?"

quote.quotes: "Dreams
quote.name: hope; in this world

quote.quotes: "What we need now is not the diary of the past
quote.anime: but instead the calendar of the future."

quote.quotes: "Either way
quote.anime: the only ones who can die tomorrow are those who survive today."

quote.quotes: "Dreams. Each man longs to pursue his dream. Each man is tortured by this dream
quote.anime: but the dream gives meaning to his life. Even if the dream ruins his life
quote.id: man cannot allow himself to leave it behind. In this world
quote.name: is man ever able to possess anything more solid

quote.quotes: "While many can pursue their dreams in solitude
quote.anime: other dreams are like great storms blowing hundreds
quote.id: even thousands of dreams apart in their wake. Dreams breathe life into men and can cage them in suffering. Men live and die by their dreams. But long after they have been abandoned they still smolder deep in men's hearts. Some see nothing more than life and death. They are dead
quote.name: for they have no dreams."

quote.quotes: "Humans always pursue things they can’t reach. Doesn’t it single-heartedly symbolize such yearnings?"
quote.name: Legend of the Galactic Heroes

quote.quotes: "Friendship might begin with getting picked
quote.anime: but I don't think that you can stop picking for yourself either. But in order to choose
quote.id: there are things you need to know. And in order to get picked
quote.name: you need them to know certain things."

quote.quotes: "I’d rather fight and regret it than not fight and regret it."
quote.name: Reinhard von Lohengramm

quote.quotes: "'Those who believe will be saved'. It's just that I wanted to find out whether you'll be saved if you believed. If such a thing were true
quote.anime: I feel like I can change myself too."

quote.quotes: "One victory greedily demands the next set of victories from the victor
"If you're friends with everyone
quote.anime: you become a popular guy in return; but then
quote.id: you wouldn't have a place where you can be who you truly are."
quote.name: Akuma To Love Song

quote.quotes: "Regardless of the color of eyes or skin
quote.anime: the color of blood is the same for everyone
quote.name: Legend of the Galactic Heroes

quote.quotes: "To me
quote.anime: Kawai-san is like a mirror. A mirror that reflects all the bad parts about you. A devil-like mirror that contaminates your heart."

quote.quotes: "But I wasn't slacking at all. I practiced till I passed out. I gave my all. And if I still turned in a sloppy performance after all that
quote.anime: then... That's who I am now. It's the current me
quote.name: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso

quote.quotes: "Everybody has to display a certain loyalty to their paycheck. I was the same way. It isn’t just a piece of paper
quote.anime: but a chain that binds people."

quote.quotes: "If you can move on
"Nothing can stay unchanged. Fun things… Happy things… They can’t possibly remain the same."
quote.name: Furukawa Nagisa

quote.quotes: "The day before yesterday
quote.id: it was a deer. And today
quote.name: it’s you."

quote.quotes: "Humans can’t reverse the flow of time. If you try to twist it against its will… You’ll be punished.
"Sometimes feelings get tangled together with deductions
quote.anime: forming a veil that hides the truth. "

quote.quotes: "Humans live behind masks.
"The hot blood that flows through my body... is not something that can be suppressed by other people!"
quote.name: Bulat

quote.quotes: "Life comes at a cost. Wouldn’t it be arrogant to die before you’ve repaid that debt?"
quote.name: Yuuji Kazami

quote.quotes: "If you forced someone to do something they didn’t want to do
quote.anime: they’d just end up hating life."

quote.quotes: "You need to decide where you belong before anything else. If you can do that
quote.anime: you can decide what you want to do."

quote.quotes: "Neither terrorism nor occultism have ever impacted history in any constructive way."
quote.name: Yang Wenli

quote.quotes: "Time brings an end to all things. Even if we plug our ears and cover our eyes. "
quote.name: Pharos

quote.quotes: "In the long flow of time
quote.anime: living things know nothing of their ancestors
quote.id: except for the genes they’ve inherited. Only mankind has history. Having a history differentiates mankind from all other living species. That’s why I wanted to be a historian."
quote.name: Legend of the Galactic Heroes

quote.quotes: "Perfection is a fairly nonexistent thing. If you couldn’t do it
quote.anime: it was probably impossible for anybody else
quote.name: Legend of the Galactic Heroes

quote.quotes: "One cannot live by jokes alone. But if there were no jokes
"Listen up
quote.anime: Cookie. Summer break is a break. We forget about homework. That's common sense. Understand?"
quote.id: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de

quote.quotes: "See
quote.anime: 'empty' just means you have plenty of room to take in all kinds of new things. Fun things
quote.name: painful things

quote.quotes: "There are so many weapons scattered across my path that it makes me wonder if this world is made of little more than lead and gunpowder."
quote.name: Jonathan Mar

quote.quotes: "<About Ciel> He turns his back towards the light without hesitation. That figure that charges into the abyss at a dignified pace. How beautiful and foolish."
quote.name: Sebastian Michaelis

quote.quotes: "Put a steel mask on your face and armor on your heart."
quote.name: Koko Hekmatyar

quote.quotes: "I just think we're missing out if we're not trying different things and having fun. Life's too short."
quote.name: Birthday

quote.quotes: "I always believed that everyone in this world was far nicer and smarter than me. That no matter how unlikeable they seemed to be
quote.anime: they still had a good conscience and had justifiable circumstances for acting the way they did. That’s why I hated myself for being so timid and depressed when I didn’t even have any good reason for doing so. …But now I see that there actually are people who’re despicable in every way and don’t blink twice at ruining another’s life. Now that I think about it
quote.id: it’s almost strange. Why don’t most people try to kill other people? How can they just stand by and let the scum have their way without the slightest indifference? Maybe my expectations were too high. I’m only disappointed because I expected something from them. But the answer was quite simple all along. There’s no such thing as a decent human being in this world. Not a single one. I did what I had to do. And I feel quite refreshed after doing it. That’s why I can say that this world could afford to be a little more chaotic."
quote.name: Oyasumi Punpun

quote.quotes: "I always say what exactly what I'm feeling
quote.anime: and if they don't like me
quote.id: that's fine! It doesn't change the fact that I was close to their hearts."
quote.name: Sword Art Online II

quote.quotes: "It's better to be hurt than to hurt others. Nice people can be happy with just that."
quote.name: Kaneki Ken

quote.quotes: "I never knew that spending an entire day doing nothing could be so terrifying. A plague of what-ifs assaults me
quote.id: even though thinking about them makes no difference."
quote.name: Solanin

quote.quotes: "There is only one person who you can each truly love. It’s too bad that you can’t change who that person is. If you could
quote.anime: the you both would be a lot happier."

quote.quotes: "Humans must think about living on. And
quote.anime: must also understand death. Most important
quote.id: we must learn to understand the truth."
quote.name: xxxHOLiC

quote.quotes: "Instead of regretting what we cannot do
quote.anime: it is better to do what one can. Even for example
quote.id: what you do has nothing to do with results
quote.name: you must forge forward."

quote.quotes: "The depths of despair…. I feel so calm here. I won’t be tricked by anyone anymore
quote.anime: and I don’t have to resent anyone. There’s nothing here. Not even loving. Nothing but to keep dancing until I die away."

quote.quotes: "Although Punpun didn’t really want to think about what the point of having dreams that could never come true was… To have dreams and worries that you could talk frankly about… In a way
quote.anime: that was probably a more fulfilling lifestyle than his own
quote.id: Punpun admitted. Being cool was merely a paper-thin difference away from being empty."
quote.name: Oyasumi Punpun

quote.quotes: "The main reason I got stronger was so I’d be able to survive."
quote.name: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote.quotes: "Believe in yourself... If you don’t have that... it doesn’t matter how many talents you have
quote.anime: you still won’t be able to hold your head up high..."

quote.quotes: "My will is society's will. My eyes are society's eyes. Since you vowed to respect the law
quote.anime: you cannot deny me... no matter how much you despise latent criminals."

quote.quotes: "If the being casting judgment is perfect
quote.anime: then it has to judge itself as well."

quote.quotes: "Freedom
quote.anime: isn’t something earned through suffering or pushing yourself. You must accept yourself just as you are and live according to the flow of things; that is true freedom.

quote.quotes: "Even if it's dangerous
quote.anime: even if it lasts until the ends of the earth... I need to walk my path."

quote.quotes: "If comrades that you trust gather around you
quote.anime: hope can take physical form and become visible. That`s what I believe..."

quote.quotes: "Even if you're made a fool of by someone
quote.anime: even if the future becomes so dark that you can't see what's in front of you
quote.id: even if the place we get to is the very end of the world
quote.name: you and I are still together."

quote.quotes: "Why shouldn't you quit
quote.anime: if that's what you really want to do? Everything will work out somehow."

quote.quotes: "Nothing will progress while you can't make up your mind."
quote.name: Ai Kotani

quote.quotes: "You know why people stress over things? Because there aren't any easy answers."
quote.name: Ai Kotani

quote.quotes: "It'll still feel better to try and regret
quote.anime: than regret not trying at all."

quote.quotes: "I realized it one day. The lyrics I struggled to create are only made up so I would have something to sing. Nothing genuine can come out of these flat and boring and ambiguous lives we're living
quote.anime: out of faking your worries for the sake of it."

quote.quotes: "Yeah
quote.id: but it's sad that you can't know yourself without being compared to others."
quote.name: Solanin

quote.quotes: "Yeah
quote.anime: I know there's no right answer. All I know for sure is that time keeps on flowing like a river
quote.id: and a river eventually leads to the ocean. Maybe I will try swimming against the current."
quote.name: Solanin

quote.quotes: "No matter how well you get along together
quote.anime: sometimes the smallest of cracks turn into a lethal abyss in time."

quote.quotes: "We've got no light of hope in our future! Nothing is going to happen! Our lives will be as dull as rocks! Maybe it's a life of boring happiness! But I don't want to be an adult who pretends to be satisfied with it!"
quote.name: Naruo Taneda

quote.quotes: "When you lose something
quote.anime: you gotta find something to take its place. I guess it's just time... for me to move forward for once."

quote.quotes: "Once you see a guy ignore the light in order to cross the street
"Why did I fall in love with music in the first place?"
quote.name: Jirō Yamada

quote.quotes: "A band isn't so simple... that you can just mess around and keep it going."
quote.name: Jirō Yamada

quote.quotes: "I might seem to be on the losing side to you
quote.anime: but I'm still fighting... Not all battles happen in the brightest
quote.name: Solanin

quote.quotes: "This town is overflowing with people
quote.anime: and each has their own worries
quote.id: big or small... How many of them can truly say that they're happy?"
quote.name: Solanin

quote.quotes: "I'm begging you
"Do you know the truth of the battlefield? Kill a man normally
quote.anime: and it's considered a crime. But kill many on the battlefield and you become a hero!"
quote.id: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

quote.quotes: "Know how strong you are... and do what you can do. If you misjudge your abilities on the battlefield... you'll get yourself killed."
quote.name: Yugo Kuga

quote.quotes: "People aren't all perfect. They're weak
quote.id: and they get jealous and try to bring others down. Oddly enough
quote.name: the better you are

quote.quotes: "When some things contradict each other
quote.anime: you should look at the opposite side of everything. And when the meanings behind the seemingly unnatural actions are made clear
quote.id: a completely different answer might be reached... Justice can become evil. Reality can become an illusion. Meaning can be found in something that appears meaningless. Think. And find the answer for yourselves. A human ceases to be once he or she stops thinking. "
quote.name: Nanatsu no Taizai

quote.quotes: "I think
quote.anime: if you want to improve yourself
quote.id: you should challenge your own limits."
quote.name: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru

quote.quotes: "It’s hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember."
quote.name: Izaya Orihara

quote.quotes: "War is merely one method of diplomacy. However
quote.anime: it is the least efficient one."
quote.id: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

quote.quotes: "Only fools wage war."
quote.anime: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quote.name: Charles Zi Britannia

quote.quotes: "Lelou? I'm glad that I could talk to you in the end. You know? When I got my memories back
quote.anime: I was so scared... A fake teacher... Friends with no memories... Everyone was... lying to me... It was as if... the whole world was watching over me... Lelou
quote.id: you've been fighting... all by yourself against this world... All by yourself... So that's why... I wanted to become the one thing truthful to you... I love you
quote.name: Lelou. Even when I knew you killed my father... I couldn't... bring myself to hate you. Even when you tried to make me forget everything... I still fell... in love with you again... Even when my memories were altered... I still fell in love again... No matter how many times I'm reborn... I'm sure I'll... fall in love with you again

quote.quotes: "The scariest thing about killing people is getting used to it! When you kill someone and realize you won't be punished... That's when people forget all about punishment!"
quote.name: Satomi Rentarou

quote.quotes: "Throughout all of history
quote.anime: no wise king has ever forced his army to obey him through oppression. People will only truly fight for what is right. And there is only one thing that is truly right in this world! The one true
quote.id: unchanging righteousness in the world is... cuteness! Cute makes right! All our needs
quote.name: desires

quote.quotes: "You'll have some painful
quote.id: most of them will be tragic. But we chose to walk this path. We'll take on the dirty work. And change the world. After we finish
quote.name: we can disappear."

quote.quotes: "Protecting the powerless is simply a soldier's duty!"
quote.name: Wave

quote.quotes: "Everyone shows their true face on death's doorstep. Even a noble-minded gentlemen will cast away his principles to beg on the ground. Even a cordial and gentle lady will start cursing with a face like a demon's. Even a frivolous and humorous man will accept death without any punchlines... That is what I believe--The instant just prior to death is when all sorts of true natures will be revealed. Using fear and suffering leading straight to death
quote.anime: baring naked hearts to be admired at one's leisure... This is also one of the wonders of murder."

quote.quotes: "Pull yourself up after falling and advance with resilience."
quote.name: Kamiya Kyousuke

quote.quotes: "Whether in a brawl or anything else
quote.anime: bones can be broken but the spirit must not yield. Once a decision was made
quote.id: it must be upheld until the bitter end."
quote.name: Psycho Love Comedy

quote.quotes: "Love is never without trials and tribulations--precisely because of that
quote.anime: there's bitterness. What do you think? The feelings from liking someone... cannot be satisfied by your own efforts alone. It's not the same as simple anger or sadness. One-sidedly declaring your feelings... this doesn't bring satisfaction. Only when the other person feels the same way... Only when two hearts love each other is fulfillment achieved."

quote.quotes: "I think that education will prove the most powerful force in this world."
quote.name: Maou

quote.quotes: "We lost. We got wiped out. We may be finished. Maybe it was all a waste. Like they always said... We're idiots who've wasted our time on something as pointless as games. Game junkies who never leave their houses. Vegetables. But who cares? We knew that all along. We knew it
quote.anime: and we do it anyway. But we love games. We chose this. And sometimes we'll win
quote.id: and sometimes we'll lose. So what? We've dedicated our lives to it. So it's real!"
quote.name: Log Horizon

quote.quotes: "When you protect someone you want to keep safe
quote.anime: do you always weigh your own life against theirs?"

quote.quotes: "Everyone smiles
quote.anime: when they are with you. Please... from now on
quote.id: go and help people in my place. Share your happiness with them."
quote.name: Sword Art Online

quote.quotes: "You stole this world and it's people. You're a king of thieves
"If  you are lookin' back all the time
"Do evil
quote.id: then claim demons were brainwashing you. A common way that human politicians evade responsibility."
quote.name: Maoyuu Maou Yuusha

quote.quotes: "Keeping all the wealth for yourself may make your rich
quote.anime: but it won’t make you prosperous. You give people money
quote.id: and they spend it. True prosperity comes from a free flow of wealth and goods."
quote.name: Maoyuu Maou Yuusha

quote.quotes: "If people want to
quote.anime: they can become angels or demons themselves."

quote.quotes: "There's no way of telling what people will do when their entire world gets turned upside down. There are people who selfishly take advantage  of the chaos and nice people who try to help others before even worrying about themselves."
quote.name: Rika Suzuki

quote.quotes: "Sometimes it's necessary to courageously retreat."
quote.name: Ashiya Shirou

quote.quotes: "I fell for you out of my own free will. So if I ever fall out of love
quote.anime: that'll be my own decision too."

quote.quotes: "The peaceful world I'm fighting for is one where everyone has a smile on their face
quote.anime: not one where I have to pretend I didn't see you make my friend cry. I don't think that kind of peace is worth fighting for. And I don't think it's worth making sacrifices to achieve it."

quote.quotes: "Life is like a node which is born within the flow of information. As a species of life that carries DNA as its memory system... man gains his individuality from the memories he carries. While memories may as well be the same as fantasy... it is by these memories that mankind exists."
quote.name: Puppet Master

quote.quotes: "All things change in a dynamic environment. Your effort to remain what you are is what limits you."
quote.name: Puppet Master

quote.quotes: "And can you offer me proof of your existence? How can you
quote.anime: when neither modern science nor philosophy can explain what life is?"

quote.quotes: "Regret is the domain of those who have earned the right to look back at the past. All I have is shame."
quote.name: Kurama

quote.quotes: "There is no greater accomplishment in life than pushing yourself to the limit
quote.anime: always! Isn’t that so? That’s all there is to it!"
quote.id: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei

quote.quotes: "The city is changing. Our surroundings
quote.anime: and even ourselves. And then one day
quote.name: CLANNAD

quote.quotes: "Please don’t apologize. If you did
quote.id: then it’d be like it was all a lie. I want to hold those memories we had dear. The fun times… The painful times… All of it. So please
quote.name: don’t apologize."

quote.quotes: "You’re the spore of a flower. You’ll be going on a trip
quote.anime: taken away by the wind. To go to new places and meet new people. You shouldn’t always rely on your sister. Even if you’re apart
quote.id: your bonds still remain. That’s what family is.

quote.quotes: "It’s good that good friends can say their true thoughts out
quote.anime: as it shows how good their relationship. It’s something worth celebrating over… but things just won’t be that smooth sailing. Some things are only ‘good’ once they’re hidden. Once others know of the truth
quote.id: what’s left in the heart may only be regret."
quote.name: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu

quote.quotes: "If you get all worked up yourself
quote.anime: you’ll always get someone who’ll rebel. Being too eager brings negative results."

quote.quotes: "What’s important is not losing sight of your path. "
quote.name: Yoshino Yūsuke

quote.quotes: "Who’ll give up when it comes to such a mere setback? We haven’t lost yet! We’ll kneel on the floor and regret only after all possibilities are exhausted!"
quote.name: Yoshii Akihisa

quote.quotes: "People normally say that mood and body have a close relationship. As the heart becomes weaker
quote.anime: the body will fall ill; and as the body falls ill
quote.name: when humans are weak

quote.quotes: "Fear comes from within
quote.anime: and isn’t something that can be conquered psychologically in such a short while."

quote.quotes: "Nobody will be happy being told off for something they never did."
quote.name: Sakamoto Yuuji

quote.quotes: "Only I can help myself
quote.id: I can make up for all my misfortunes and change the world into a place where there's no irrational discrimination and that's why there's no way in hell that I can die here!"
quote.name: Akame ga KILL!

quote.quotes: "When you are experienced you can become overly confident and such confidence can prove fatal."
quote.name: Horo

quote.quotes: "Living your life to the fullest 'til the moment of your death
quote.anime: this is the rule to live by in any world."

quote.quotes: "At times the life of a single man is worth more than that of a million
quote.anime: I thought that'd be common sense to a soldier."
quote.id: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

quote.quotes: "Right now
quote.anime: I'm letting you live. And I'll continue to keep you alive... until you've grown enough to become worth killing."

quote.quotes: "Between dreams and reality is the vault of your soul. No one could see the “Dream World” without this path."
quote.name: Ginko

quote.quotes: "On this hand
quote.anime: imagine that these four fingers represent the animals
quote.id: and the thumb represents plants. Then let's say people are here... On the tip of the middle finger
quote.name: farthest from the heart."

quote.quotes: "Sometimes the best way to solve your own problems is to help someone else."
quote.name: Iroh

quote.quotes: "The moment you say a word of parting
quote.anime: you've already parted. So long as you and I are both somewhere in this world

The point of life isn’t to be perfect.
It’s to do want you want to do

quote.quotes: "Marriage

And people won't help those who run away and do nothing. As long as you don't give up

quote.quotes: "To someone who bears responsibility

quote.quotes: "No single thing is perfect by itself. That's why we're born to attract other things to make up for what we lack. I think we start walking in the right direction only after we start getting our counterparts beside us."

quote.quotes: "Being frightened of a strong enemy is perfectly natural. Confidence is something you build up
"Bare emotions tell the truth much eloquently than any justification."

quote.quotes: "The past and the future are not the same
quote.anime: but they're not completely separate either."

quote.quotes: "For people like us
quote.anime: we do not have a choice over the environment we're in
quote.id: but we get to decide what we will make of it and what path we will take from there."

quote.quotes: "When you're on a bike
quote.anime: the ocean's a lot closer than you think. The autumn salt wind went right through to the back of my nose. And maybe it's because
quote.name: my head was empty."

quote.quotes: "When extremes are reached
"It's scary to decide
quote.anime: isn't it? But we have to decide something. If we make a decision
quote.name: Gatchaman Crowds

quote.quotes: "Our injuries will heal as long as we're alive. But the scars will remain."
quote.name: Allen Walker

quote.quotes: "If we only believe when the odds are with us
quote.anime: then that's not believing at all."

quote.quotes: "I pretended it was someone else's fault that nothing happened. But I was wrong. If you put your mind to it
quote.anime: you can change the color of your world in an instant."

quote.quotes: "I realized why I was lost. It's not because I didn't have a map... It was because I didn't have a destination."
quote.name: Yuuta Takemoto

quote.quotes: "I'm not stupid. I'm just too lazy to show how smart I am."
quote.name: Oreki Houtarou

quote.quotes: "When I was a child
quote.id: I would play and make snowballs. When you start rolling a snowball
quote.name: someone will always appear out of nowhere and help you make it bigger and in the end

quote.quotes: "I am not going to take sides
quote.anime: I am neutral. I am talking about standpoints here
quote.id: that is all. Miss Class Representative (Hanekawa Tsubasa) has her point of view and her parents have their own. There is no way for an outsider to know which of them is right. Actually
quote.name: there is not a right one in the first place. It is just about who is easier to agree with."

quote.quotes: "Do not lose to the obstacles that you will meet in the future. I have my own set of goals but do not pursue them because of my laziness."
quote.name: Okazaki Tomoya

quote.quotes: "Run until you can't run anymore
quote.anime: and then run again. Constant effort is life's greatest shortcut."

quote.quotes: "A garden retains its beauty as long as it is tended to and cared for. Life in general
quote.anime: is the same. Once it becomes pretty
quote.id: it mustn't go back to being the primitive mess it started out as."
quote.name: Rewrite

quote.quotes: "Fake people have an image to maintain. Real people just don't care."
quote.anime: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
quote.name: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote.quotes: "Knowing what it feels to be in pain
quote.anime: is exactly why we try to be kind to others."

quote.quotes: "Although I'm weak and full of flaws
quote.anime: I will never stop moving forward. No matter who I am
quote.id: no one other than myself will create my own existence. No matter what others may think or feel
quote.name: I will still move forward as myself."

quote.quotes: "A person can only murder another once. The act of murder is giving up the humanity that is within oneself. What is left is just emptiness. You can not lose humanity if it is already lost. The act of murder turns into the act of slaughter. They are two different things."
quote.name: Ryougi Shiki

quote.quotes: "If you don't take risks
"On the internet
quote.anime: we only know each other's usernames. If we were talking face to face
quote.id: I probably would never talk to them this way. They look at the 'Real Me'. They support me a lot... I wish there were more people like them."
quote.name: Koko Ni Iru Yo!

quote.quotes: "You only understand the true value of things after you've lost them."
quote.name: Ayumu Aikawa

quote.quotes: "Words alone
quote.anime: can make an entire army withdraw."

quote.quotes: "Moping around with sadness and sorrow... what will come of it? Even dead people can do that. However
quote.anime: I'll live and stand on my own two legs. If we are going to die one day
quote.id: wouldn't it be better to have no regrets?"
quote.name: Kuroshitsuji

quote.quotes: "The world is destined for even greater chaos."
quote.anime: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quote.name: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote.quotes: "Remember this... no matter where you go
quote.anime: the strength of your mind and spirit is the most powerful magic of all."

quote.quotes: "You didn't raise a weapon. You raised a son. "
quote.name: Shura Kirigakure

quote.quotes: "You should keep your distance from me if you want to live. My place is in the shadows
quote.anime: yours in the light. We walk opposite paths
quote.id: Aberline. It's best that you remember that. "
quote.name: Kuroshitsuji

quote.quotes: "You want to keep everyone from dying? That's naive. It's war. People die."
quote.name: Monkey D. Luffy

quote.quotes: "When you confess your feelings
quote.anime: you should do a proper job."

quote.quotes: "I'm neither a soldier
quote.anime: nor a brave man. Not to mention that running away isn't the same thing as losing. You only truly lose by dying. So as long you're alive
quote.name: Kakumeiki Valvrave

quote.quotes: "A past will chase you if you try to escape from it
quote.id: it's just an old memory inside you.

quote.quotes: "Is there truly any human who is not arrogant? "
quote.name: Ciel Phantomhive

quote.quotes: "You are saying that innately
quote.id: and if they were to just assume their nature
quote.name: this organization wouldn't be so rotten

quote.quotes: "I'm rather proud of my ability to tell lies. I can trick not only others
quote.id: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei

quote.quotes: "The meaning to our existence... is to live. To remember those who have died and face the world. God doesn't exist. I will. Through my own will."

quote.quotes: "It's not that you don't know how to interact with people. It's just that no one ever came to interact with you."
quote.name: Maka Albarn

quote.quotes: "When you're hiding a secret from the whole world
quote.anime: it puts a weight on your shoulders."

quote.quotes: "Everything doesn't have to be decided by life and death. Just think about the future."
quote.name: Gray Fullbuster

quote.quotes: "We found ourselves in conflict with each other many times. There were hard times when we wanted to run away or give up. But it was only because that rain fell
quote.anime: that the seeds of our emotions could sprout. And the flowers of deeper friendship could bloom.

quote.quotes: "Opportunities wait for no one! If you let an opportunity slip through your fingers with an excuse like
quote.anime: “I wasn't prepared.” You'll never get another opportunity like that again! But it is your life. Live it the way you want.

quote.quotes: "Dividing an impossibly large task into smaller solvable problems
"Schools are facilities where human society secludes the troublesome children by age criteria."
quote.name: Hampnie Hambart

quote.quotes: "Opportunities and success come only to those who do not fear to stand in the batter's box. Who want to hit the ball more than anything
quote.anime: and swing with all their might!"

quote.quotes: "Before creation there must be destruction. If my soul stands in the way
quote.anime: then I'll toss it aside. Yes
quote.id: I have no choice but to move forward. "
quote.name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion

quote.quotes: "Everyone can make a choice after they have learned what it will result in. It is so easy to say we should have done it this way afterwards. But you can't know what your choice will result in before actually choosing."
quote.name: Armin Arlelt

quote.quotes: "You must look within yourself to save yourself from your other self. Only then will your true self reveal itself."
quote.name: Iroh

quote.quotes: "I'm not against socializing
quote.anime: so long as it's not tiring."

quote.quotes: "Rock
quote.name: what do we really value in life? God? Love? Don't make me laugh. When I was a brat

quote.quotes: "If you're lonely
quote.anime: you should say something! If you're worried
quote.id: say something! Most people aren't as sharp as you are! If you want those people to understand you
quote.name: you should say something! Even if you're worried that you'll embarrass yourself

quote.quotes: "I haven't lived all that long yet
quote.anime: but there is something I firmly believe in. The people who have the ability to change something in this world
quote.name: have the guts to abandon things important to them if they have to. They are those who can abandon even their humanity."

quote.quotes: "Why are you staring at me? Are you annoyed that I am the only one who has cake?"
quote.name: L Lawliet

quote.quotes: "To climb a hill on a difficult road
quote.anime: you need to be walking steadily."

quote.quotes: "Gohan
quote.anime: you showed me that power is nothing without being guided without love."

quote.quotes: "I don't think anyone is born knowing the reason why they're here. It's just something you have to find as you go along."
quote.name: Honda Tohru

quote.quotes: "To become a monster like me
quote.anime: is to admit you were too weak to remain a human."

quote.quotes: "Those who rely on 'someday' will only grow weaker and lowlier."

quote.quotes: "'I long to see someone who died'
quote.name: 'I want to protect the world'... They're all desires. In other words

quote.quotes: "Sometimes
quote.anime: we have to look beyond what we want and do what's best."

quote.quotes: "The world lies! Thou shalt not commit murder
quote.anime: thou shalt not bear false witness
quote.name: thou shalt not steal

quote.quotes: "Denying possibility is denying thought."
quote.name: Alcor

quote.quotes: "Laws aren't perfect
quote.anime: because humans who created laws aren't perfect. It's impossible to be perfect. However
quote.id: the laws are evidence of the human's struggle to be righteous."

quote.quotes: "It's stupid to talk about things you're not. Be yourself and you'll be fine."

quote.quotes: "We are all farsighted
quote.anime: we give importance to those things that are far from us
quote.id: while neglecting the things that are close to us... only to realize their value later
quote.name: when they are out-of-reach again."

quote.quotes: "Manga endings might always end the same. However
quote.anime: if it comes to life. Neither you or I are mere readers. We are writers. We can change the ending."

quote.quotes: "People are like dice
quote.anime: a certain Frenchman said that. You throw yourself in the direction of your own choosing. People are free because they can do that. Everyone's circumstances are different
quote.id: but no matter how small the choice
quote.name: at the very least

quote.quotes: "Murder doesn't necessarily mean evil
quote.anime: right? The world being what it is

quote.quotes: "Time flows constantly

quote.quotes: "The world is not meant just to be looked at

quote.quotes: "I love this game that people call 'life' from the bottom of my heart."

quote.quotes: "It's because I've experienced pain in the past

quote.quotes: "What do you suppose the most irrational thing is? - It's humanity."

quote.quotes: "The world consists of 'choices'

quote.quotes: "There's nothing that won't change
quote.anime: every day things will change a little bit more."

quote.quotes: "Resignation is what kills people. Once they've rejected resignation
quote.anime: humans gain the privilege of making humanity their footpath."

quote.quotes: "A certain scripture mentions that humans are superior to angels. Why? Because there are people who know of evil
quote.anime: but do not become evil. It's different from angels
quote.id: who know only of good since birth. Humans have evil
quote.name: but can live as good

quote.quotes: "Reject common sense to make the impossible possible!"
quote.name: Simon

quote.quotes: "Some things can't be prevented. The last of which
quote.anime: is death. All we can do is live until the day we die. Control what we can... and fly free!"

quote.quotes: "God is emotional bullshit."

quote.quotes: "Whatever your thoughts may be
quote.id: none of it will be acknowledged by others."

quote.quotes: "I think having a dream
quote.id: and never giving up couldn't possibly bring misfortune."
quote.name: Bakuman

quote.quotes: "You must be prepared to face the worst possible scenarios. Because harsh reality strikes without warning.
"We really are weak creatures
quote.anime: but that's why we can strive to become stronger. Even if you feel it's useless
quote.id: each step we take leads to something great. That's why I'm sure we'll be able to change. Because we're weak... and because death is inevitable. Humans try their best to live and end up becoming stronger.

quote.quotes: "Enduring and forgiving are two different things. You must not forget the unjustness of society. As a human being
quote.anime: you must hold the event in contempt. Yet
quote.id: you must endure. You must put an end to the chain of hatred!

quote.quotes: "Nothing worse than being strong
"There is a reason one wears make-up on stage. Applying color to one's face is almost a spell. When one's face is different

quote.quotes: "I don't care what the society says. I've regretted doing anything. I will survive and do what I want to."

quote.quotes: "The fear of interacting with people...even I understand that one."

quote.quotes: "You can never tell what'll happen next in life. But so long as you have faith in your feet

quote.quotes: "There's nothing that's entirely black or white."

quote.quotes: "Drop ink on the finest snow-white paper and it will inevitably absorb into black. Its purity demands it. Tainted men have immunities. Black does not absorb black.
"How can you move forward if you keep regretting the past?
"We're nothing like God. Not only do we have limited powers
quote.anime: but sometimes we're driven to become the devil himself."

quote.quotes: "'If I do this
quote.name: I can stop the rebellion'... Open your eyes

quote.id: but in exchange hatred and jealousy filled my heart

quote.quotes: "Sometimes the truth can hurt others more than a lie."

quote.quotes: "Regardless of our limitations
quote.anime: we can always be of some use. Our power may seem insignificant... but it may just prove to be useful in the grand scheme of things. Stay focused. Never avert your eyes
quote.name: even our insignificant power may be enough to determine the fate of the world. Which is why everyone must stay alert and ready to strike at any moment!"

quote.quotes: "Humans have the ability to actively put things to an end rather than simply accept what's in store."

quote.quotes: "I want to find a path that no one else had taken into consideration."

quote.quotes: "There are three conditions to terrify someone: One
quote.id: the monster has to be unidentifiable. Three

quote.quotes: "It's not possible to save everything. Prioritize your goals."

quote.quotes: "When you are trying to rebuild a build that was made incorrectly
quote.anime: you first have to destroy it. I thought this was the true."

quote.quotes: "No one can draw a clear line between sane and insane. You move that line as you see fit for yourself. No one else can. You'll understand soon... that the one that's insane is this world."

quote.quotes: "Don't you think dreams and the Internet are similar? They are both areas where the repressed conscious mind vents."

quote.quotes: "If fighting could provide us with the truth

quote.quotes: "From the perspective of others I am part of the world
quote.anime: but when I observe the world from my perspective I am nowhere to be found. To observe is to create perspective. I can never cease to be the point of origin from my perspective. I observe that which is not myself. This is the first principle to find."

quote.quotes: "A lie is truth
quote.anime: until you recognize it as a lie. To see the truth behind those lies is probably the right thing to do. However
quote.id: it may not necessarily bring happiness. Lies are Happiness."

quote.quotes: "Know much about purgatory? It's the place between heaven and hell
quote.anime: where those who were left behind
quote.id: unable to get into heaven continue to suffer
quote.name: a place of struggle and pain. In other words

quote.quotes: "Do what you can until you learn what you need. If you're going to try something
quote.anime: you may as well aim for the top."

quote.quotes: "Real power is forged from the desire smoldering in the heart. It fans into a flame and begins to burn with an intensity scarcely imagined to be possible.
"Every one of us must do what's in their power! If we're going to die anyway
quote.anime: then it's better to die fighting than to do nothing!"

quote.quotes: "Remember. You can feel it if you hold your hand against your chest. It belongs to no one. It's our pulse
quote.anime: yours and mine. This is what brings us to the truth. It's what proves that we are the very world itself. Follow your instincts. The answer is already there.

quote.quotes: "Let me ask you the reverse. How is it that you can give up so easily? [exaggerated sigh] I can't understand that…attitude! “It's bad luck! I have no choice!” People who passively accept their fate…because no one knows their future
quote.id: so I don't dare put things off. I have to do what I can
quote.name: while I can still do it

quote.quotes: "I want to know if it is a crime to live as you are
quote.anime: when you are different from others."

quote.quotes: "There's nothing special about being born. Not a thing. Most of the universe is just death
quote.anime: nothing more. In this universe of ours
quote.id: the birth of a new life on some corner of our planet is nothing but a tiny
quote.name: insignificant flash. Death is a normal thing. So why live?

quote.quotes: "What is important is to know fear and yet take a step forward."

quote.quotes: "No matter what I attempt
quote.anime: even if it's the most simple of tasks
quote.id: it always ends in failure. Unfortunately
quote.name: I find that my life is one big regret after another. Yet

quote.quotes: "In our society
quote.anime: letting others find out that you're a nice person is a very risky move. It's extremely likely that someone would take advantage of that."

quote.quotes: "Because my time is limited
quote.anime: I don't have any time to waste hesitating. That is why I can walk straight ahead. That is why I never stop."

quote.quotes: "Now I feel that maybe knowing who I actually am is the key to reach perfection. Because that means knowing what I can and cannot do."
quote.name: Itachi Uchiha

quote.quotes: "Who are you again? Sorry
quote.anime: I have a bad memory for ugly faces."

quote.quotes: "Only hope can give rise to the emotion we call despair. But it is nearly impossible for a man to try to live without hope
quote.anime: so I guess that leaves Man no choice but to walk around with despair as his companion."

quote.quotes: "No matter how hard you practice
quote.anime: 'someday' and 'maybe' aren't good enough. I need to know if you have ambitious goals and the will to accomplish them."

quote.quotes: "Trying without the winning intent is meaningless."
quote.name: Hiruma Youichi

quote.quotes: "Of what worth is a king who fails to protect the powerless?"
quote.name: Saber

quote.quotes: "Under normal circumstances
quote.anime: humans should have continued to evolve as the greatest creatures upon this earth
quote.id: but we were actually regressing. A rotten world. Politics
quote.name: law

quote.quotes: "Do you understand how to handle cards now? I win as long as I can make you think 'there's no way he will play that card'."
quote.name: Hiruma Youichi

quote.quotes: "Sinful? Corrupt? I don't understand your logic. Why must pleasure and sin be connected? Pleasure gotten through evil means could be a sin. But pleasure can also result from good deeds. What kind of philosophy calls pleasure itself a sin?"
quote.name: Gilgamesh

quote.quotes: "It's not the final judgement of 'good' and 'evil' that's important. What matters is that you come to that decision yourself. That you agonize over it and eventually accept it."
quote.name: Akane Tsunemori

quote.quotes: "Life that has been lost cannot be brought back again. That very truth is what shows us the meaning and value
of living."
quote.name: Roy Mustang

quote.quotes: "Did you know every time you sigh
quote.anime: a little bit of happiness escapes?"

quote.quotes: "The ones who do what they want and enjoy the most of their lives are the ones who win in the end."
quote.name: Charlie Staz

quote.quotes: "If you dislike the situation
quote.anime: use your strength to change it."

quote.quotes: "The power of imagination is what changes everything."
quote.name: Shinsekai Yori

quote.quotes: "Fright is about the feeling that you will die. The true meaning of terror doesn't lie in a static condition
"No matter how deep the night
quote.name: One Piece

quote.quotes: "Children's minds are immature. They do not possess a firm resolve and the strength to turn their misery to anger. Confronted with a cruel fate
quote.anime: they were not provided with the choice of having a strong will. Moreover
quote.id: as they have not lived through and comprehended life
quote.name: ideals such as honor and hope are yet to be completely nurtured in them. Therefore

quote.quotes: "Even if no one in the world believes you
quote.anime: stick out your chest and scream in defiance."

quote.quotes: "Discouraging
quote.anime: isn't it? It's always easier to tear down than to build... And much more difficult to tie than to untie."

quote.quotes: "Why don't you buy paper books? E-books lack character."
quote.name: Makishima Shougo

quote.quotes: "The best way to remove your lies is to make them come true."
quote.anime: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
quote.name: Suzaku Kururugi

quote.quotes: "Things like protecting the world are no more than moral reasons that sound good."
quote.name: Soi Fon

quote.quotes: "If you run into a wall and pretend it doesn't exist
quote.anime: you'll never make progress. The wall will never change
quote.id: so you're the one who has to change."
quote.name: Gintama

quote.quotes: "One's true worth shows as hardship increases."
quote.name: Kotomine Risei

quote.quotes: "Moving on doesn't mean you forget about things. It just means you have to accept what's happened and continue living."

quote.quotes: "You wanted revenge? You're just making other people as miserable as you. Revenge is just the path you took to escape your suffering."
quote.name: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote.quotes: "The freedom to do better than you do now
quote.anime: to be better than you are now. The spirit did not create us perfectly good. She gave us the freedom to keep trying to be better everyday."

quote.quotes: "When people have different opinions
quote.anime: you should apply the majority vote."

quote.quotes: "I think the best disciplining is pain."
quote.name: Levi Ackerman

quote.quotes: "Our bodies get bigger
quote.anime: but our hearts get torn up."

quote.quotes: "Any man who has the brains to think and the nerve to act for the benefit of the people of the country
quote.id: by those who are content with stagnation and willing to endure disaster."
quote.name: Fullmetal Alchemist

quote.quotes: "If you let the fly live
quote.anime: the spider is going to die. You can't save both without one suffering.

quote.quotes: "Once you meet someone
quote.anime: you never really forget them. It just takes a while for your memory to come back to you."

quote.quotes: "Is it that you get the power
quote.anime: then you choose to protect someone else? No! We first want to protect someone
quote.id: that's why we try to get stronger in the first place."
quote.name: Toaru Majutsu no Index

quote.quotes: "Whether I win or lose is up to me."
quote.name: Akise Aru

quote.quotes: "There is no match that you know that 'you can't win'. Even if a match like that exists
quote.anime: the thing that decides the defeat is your heart. That makes you think you've 'lost'."

quote.quotes: "So what if the government collapses or the country is ruined? I'm not civic-minded! All I want to do is stand tall and live on until the day I collapse and die!"

quote.quotes: "Failing doesn't give you a reason to give up as long as you believe."
quote.name: Naruto Uzumaki

quote.quotes: "No matter how hard or impossible it is
quote.anime: never lose sight of your goal."

quote.quotes: "The bonds we have with those close to us
"What keeps me alive in this world is neither bodily organs
"If you trip while running down a hallway
quote.anime: you'll get a nosebleed. If you trip in life
quote.name: Toradora!

quote.quotes: "Time waits for no one."
quote.anime: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
quote.name: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time

quote.quotes: "True destiny cannot be changed. The reason is actually quite simple. True destiny isn't granted - it is earned. "
quote.name: Count D

quote.quotes: "If the father's responsibility is to protect the child... then my responsibility is to exceed the father."
quote.name: Naruto Uzumaki

quote.quotes: "The flowers bloom
quote.anime: then wither... The stars shine and one day become extinct. This earth
quote.name: the galaxies and even the big universe

quote.quotes: someday will be destroyed. Compared with that
quote.anime: the human life is only a blink
quote.id: just a little time. In that short time - people are born
quote.name: laugh

quote.quotes: "Then I ask you
quote.anime: what do you define as the beginning of the sky? At one hundred meter or even one thousand meters
quote.id: it isn't much different from right here. The sole difference is the air density and water concentration. So
quote.name: this is where sky begins. Anything above the earth belongs to the domain of sky."

quote.quotes: "When I was at the brink of life and death
quote.anime: I used all of my will to survive. I drew upon a different power than that of self-sacrifice and mastered an ultimate technique. The will to live is stronger than anything else. That was the ray of light that my master risked his life to show me. As Hitokiri Battousai
quote.id: I have committed so many crimes that I cannot possibly repent for them. That is why I had secretly believed that it didn't matter when I died or was killed. However

We don't choose the path we take because of the sins we carry. But we carry our sins on the path we choose."

quote.anime: right? Compared to the enemy we're facing

quote.quotes: "Bearing the sins of the children of earth

quote.anime: sometimes one cannot simply give it away."

quote.quotes: "A wounded heart needs time to heal."

quote.quotes: "Well

quote.quotes: "Self-sacrifice... A nameless shinobi who protects peace within its shadow. That is a true shinobi."

quote.quotes: "Excuses are meaningless. The tougher things get

quote.name: Kousaka Kyousuke

quote.quotes: "Honest feelings can sometimes lead to cruel endings."

quote.quotes: "There will come a time in a man's life

quote.quotes: "We do have a lot in common. The same earth
quote.id: the same sky. Maybe if we started looking at what's the same

quote.quotes: "People who've lost their dreams

quote.quotes: "We have no reason to fear death

quote.anime: nothing good comes out of hurrying."

quote.quotes: "I don't know which is more pathetic; the fool

quote.quotes: "A smile is the best way to get oneself out of a tight spot

quote.quotes: "Isn't chasing our dream our job right now?"

quote.quotes: "The bully always says it's a joke. But to the one being bullied

quote.id: which are bound by these lies. They are preventing you from reaching your full potential. Which is why

quote.quotes: "You can't change reality

quote.id: because we're weak. And because we die. We have to fight in order to live

quote.quotes: "It doesn't matter who they are

quote.quotes: "Your home is the place where you can be yourself."

quote.name: perhaps

quote.quotes: "Guys are simple creatures. Just by talking to them

quote.quotes: "There are some things you can gain by letting some things go. Happiness isn't just what you have here and now."

quote.quotes: "Anything can happen. No one ever thinks it will until it does. What will happen

quote.quotes: "Depending on who you place in the same situation

quote.quotes: "Now
quote.id: there's a certain person that I'd just love to kill. It doesn't even matter whether they're weak or strong. The people I live to kill

quote.quotes: "[to Chane] Sorry about this
quote.id: but not being able to verbalize might be a lucky break for you in a way. People can waste an awful lot of energy by putting sadness into words. Or maybe joy into words. And then of course
quote.name: there's putting anger into words. And the words can double when it comes to fear or pain. In that sense

quote.quotes: "This world is merciless

quote.anime: but something far higher? If he knew of the infinite glitter of the stars
quote.id: would his dreams soar even higher? Even if one doesn't know why

quote.quotes: "First
quote.anime: we are born in the same galaxy. Born of the same species. Our lifetimes overlap. The meetings between humans are so unlikely as to be miraculous. To laugh
quote.name: and to fall in love... Everyone is made up of a collection of 1% chances. Thus

quote.quotes: "Death is simply another stage of our life.

quote.anime: there are lots of difficult and painful things. I want to fly away and escape from it all. I want to flap my wings freely."

quote.quotes: "If you can't get along without putting someone else down

quote.quotes: "No point in wondering who someone really is
quote.anime: all you can do is trust them and accept them for who they are. Because the person you come to know is who that person really is."

quote.quotes: "Power comes in response to a need

quote.quotes: "It is my perception

quote.quotes: "Well
quote.anime: nothing in life is ever certain."

quote.anime: I know everything about you... because we are connected by an extremely deep bond. No matter how far apart we are

quote.quotes: "*to Duke Nightray* You've let your own son die for the honor of your household and other such rubbish. You've lost almost all of your family
quote.anime: and yet all you can think of is your own interests."

quote.quotes: "I am Elliot Nightray and I will not let you take that away from me!!"

quote.quotes: "*to Reim* Like I said before!! To me
quote.anime: being blind is nothing! It's only because I had just woken up

quote.id: Ernest... The Head Hunter killed all of them! Because of that

quote.anime: his body's making up for lost time."

quote.anime: I left everything behind! Tranquility… Safety… They face hardships every day
quote.id: and they laugh like they’re really having fun! That’s why I decided to go out to sea! I want to laugh ’til I cry

quote.quotes: "High school girls

quote.anime: but the hardships that he endured as a child
quote.id: molded him into the person he is today. He'll be fine

quote.quotes: "Even when our eyes are closed

quote.anime: you don’t like to get hit

quote.quotes: "I wanted to see your homework from the other day. And I got to see your face while you were sleeping... so don't sweat it."

quote.quotes: "Oh look at that. My tea has gone cold."

quote.quotes: "Someday you'll let go of my hand. When you finally look to the far

quote.name: you’re lucky to be alive!

quote.quotes: "Pride is not something you can surrender."

quote.quotes: "You have already fulfilled my expectations. It appears that you’re still hiding a wealth of potential. I was watching you while your Guardians struggled to overcome their trials
quote.anime: and I could tell from your behavior and actions that you were always putting them first. And that didn’t change when Daemon set his trap. I witnessed your resolve to protect your Family
quote.id: and I was impressed. Your Guardians also responded similarly. Sawada Tsunayoshi
quote.name: I deem you worthy as boss of the tenth-generation Vongola Family"

quote.quotes: "*To himself
quote.anime: while fighting Temari* Oh man... those clouds are so lucky. so free. More to the point
quote.id: I didn't feel like doing this in the first place. And I only became a ninja because I thought life would've been more interesting as one... I suppose things aren't gonna be that simple."

quote.quotes: "We don't die for our friends

quote.name: Haruhi Fujioka

quote.quotes: "It is sky that allows the cloud to move about freely. But someday
quote.anime: I will even bite up the sky itself."

quote.quotes: "I am known as Valentinez Alkalinella Xifax Sicidabohertz Gombigobilla Blue Stradivari Talentrent Pierre Andri Charton-Haymoss Ivanovici Baldeus George Doitzel Kaiser III. Don't hesitate to call."

quote.quotes: "Hero? No! We're pirates! I love heroes
quote.anime: but I don't wanna be one! Do you know what heroes are? Say there is a chunk of meat. Pirates will have a banquet and eat it
quote.id: but heroes will share it with other people. I want all the meat!"

quote.quotes: "I bet that when they run out of delicacy points

quote.quotes: "I've done it! After years of climbing the ladder

quote.id: no one can stop me! I now rule the human race! First

quote.quotes: "Hide the truth. Manipulate information. Use intimidation."

quote.quotes: "And so... I have written down the lesson I've learned from this vital experience in form of a title suitable for a business reference book: 'Never hold meetings. The outcome is determined before the meeting begins.'"

quote.quotes: "My face feels heavy
quote.anime: and I can't walk in these shoes."

quote.quotes: "If I can
quote.anime: I'd prefer nobody to be sad."

quote.quotes: "*To Kuchiki Rukia* Are you any different!? You sacrificed yourself to save me that time!! At that time were you thinking about complicated stuff like 'this is my Shinigami duty'!? That's not what sacrificing yourself is! At the very least... I'm different! I haven't accepted any commitment. If things get bad I might run away... since I'm not a good enough person to be able to sacrifice my life for total strangers. But unfortunately I'm also not trash that can live happily without paying back his debts!"
quote.name: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote.quotes: "An ideal is only an ideal after all. As long as you embrace that ideal

quote.quotes: "I hate all these damn rich people."

quote.anime: trying to follow through on my ideals."

quote.quotes: "I'm sorry! I'm sorry
quote.anime: Takashi! I won't forget to brush my teeth again! I won't forget!..."

quote.quotes: "Mom... Mom in heaven.... Does love come suddenly like this"

quote.quotes: "Know that the only people you can save like that are the ones that survive."

quote.quotes: "Even if we are far apart. We'll always be united by tennis."

quote.quotes: "It's still too early for you to win against me."

quote.quotes: "Hinata... this is the unalterable difference in strength... the distinction that separates the elite from the failure. This is the unchangeable reality. From the moment you said you wouldn't run
quote.anime: your defeat was inevitable. The only possible outcome was your present despair... Withdraw!"

quote.quotes: "I'm gonna kick your ***."

quote.anime: you're nothing more than a trivial footnote in the brief history of a cluster of huts called the 'Leaf Village'! In time
quote.id: the Hokage Stone Faces will crumble and be worn down to nothing..."

quote.quotes: "They say that the best blaze burns brightest
quote.anime: when circumstances are at their worst."

quote.quotes: "People like you... are the reason why people like me need medication."

quote.quotes: "Oh sorry

quote.name: Koko Hekmatyar

quote.quotes: "{TO NARUTO} Oh
quote.anime: by the way... I'm a boy"

quote.quotes: "You're a hero to other poor people
quote.anime: Fujioka. You've shown the world that even a poor person can excel at an elite private academy. It must be hard for you to constantly be looked down upon by others... Spurned
quote.name: but that doesn't matter now. Long live the poor! We welcome you

quote.quotes: "Often people have it wrong
quote.anime: mistakenly believing... that showing mercy to an enemy is kindness. They spare the foe whose life is in their hands. But don't you see? It's an empty existence
quote.id: to go on living... alone and unloved... when defeat's already cost you your dream!"

quote.quotes: "Could you stop skipping the thinking process when you respond?"
quote.name: Kagami Hiiragi

quote.quotes: "*To Haruhi Fujioka about him helping her search for her wallet in water* A little water never hurt anyone. Besides
quote.anime: people are always telling me that I'm dripping with good looks."

quote.quotes: "Bitter crimson tears flow from lifeless eyes
quote.anime: and mingle with the endless sands... Bestowing ever greater power upon the demon god."

quote.quotes: "I put a propulsion engine under your seat just in case you messed up."

quote.quotes: "And the TV show ended by saying how young people are becoming increasingly illiterate
quote.anime: but doesn't browsing the Internet and blogging actually improve your literacy?"

quote.quotes: "Don't make it sound so easy! Don't you realize how hard I had to study? I worked hard... I worked so hard!"

quote.quotes: "Bye-Bye now."

quote.quotes: "Their mistakes were simple ones. Gouki's mistake was being overconfident and Kurama's... sympathy for his human prey."

quote.quotes: "Sounds like a lot of work
quote.anime: I think I'll pass. I'd rather play and I'll ask for help when I get stuck."

quote.quotes: "I love the type of woman who can kick my ***."

quote.quotes: "All they saw in me was another little ghetto rat with no power and no God. What's left for a poor little Chinese bitch to rely on? It's money of course. And guns. Fuckin' A
quote.id: the world is a great place."
quote.name: Black Lagoon

quote.quotes: "Finally I saw... A world so bright I almost wanted to cry... It was then
quote.anime: that my consciousness was engulfed in darkness."

quote.quotes: "In my mind this jacked-up sideways ridiculousness is the normal state?"
quote.name: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote.quotes: "Depending on your request
quote.anime: whether I will laugh or get angry - that will decide your lifespan
quote.name: Baccano!

quote.quotes: "Incomprehensibility is a part of human life. But what does this mean? I just can't understand it."
quote.name: Graham Specter

quote.quotes: "When we hit our lowest point
quote.anime: we are open to the greatest change."

quote.quotes: "I'm impressed. No one has ever gotten the better of me like that. It is almost a shame to take the bending of someone so talented. ALMOST."
quote.name: Amon

quote.quotes: "We didn't even know each other then. And now
quote.anime: I can't imagine my life without you in it. You're the most loyal
quote.id: brave and selfless person I've ever known."
quote.name: Avatar: The Legend Of Korra

quote.quotes: "All people have sanctuary which mustn't be touched. A scar of sadness which mustn't be entered. The living confront each other to achieve their ideals. In a quiet voice
quote.anime: the man in the white coat told me... that he had finally found me
quote.id: that he wanted my life. That man smiled a smile deeper than darkness. Legato Bluesummers
quote.name: a man fascinated by Death..."

quote.quotes: "Between being eternally unable to wake from a dream
quote.anime: and being eternally unable to dream
quote.id: which do you think would be more unfortunate? Still
quote.name: both the dream that we deemed eternal

quote.quotes: "I think it's good if someone smiles when you smile at them. The beauty of voluntary acts can foster goodwill in the hearts of others. Love which doesn't ask for collateral gives us respect as people. However it's wrong to sustain that. In time
quote.anime: the strain will bloom into the flower called Lie...the thorny flower which hurts people."

quote.quotes: "Can a world this interesting actually be reality?"
quote.name: Lau

quote.quotes: "So what if I'd spare him? In my mind it's the certainty in myself that I possess which allows me to have that kind of mercy or compassion. There's no wavering on that point. It's fixed like the stars. The fact is I'm never gonna be killed! So remember this: mercy and compassion are virtues that only the strong are privileged to possess. And I am strong."

quote.quotes: "The power of one man doesn't amount to much. But
quote.anime: however little strength I'm capable of
quote.id: I'll do everything humanly possible to protect the people I love
quote.name: and in turn they will protect the ones they love. It seems like the least we tiny humans can do for each other."

quote.quotes: "There's no need to change the past. Because of the past we are who we are now. Every second
quote.anime: every action from then is linked to us here and now."

quote.quotes: "I have no parents
quote.anime: and I'm not a product of love. Therefore
quote.id: I can't understand what a 'good wife' is. Even so... the love he gave me is my entire world. No one can humiliate that."

quote.quotes: "Why is it that when humans regret the decision based on a misunderstanding they feel resentment toward the other party?"

quote.quotes: "You are calm and composed. You are able to see through things clearly at this age. You are outstanding. And... Always being able to make the correct judgments
quote.anime: not falling into darkness. Outstanding. 'That won't do'
quote.id: 'This is wrong'. You reject any number of paths... Choosing your path with cynicism. What do you want to do? How are you going to do it? What is your motive? Where do you want to move forward to? Say it. Hmm? Fine. Then stick to the ground forever to move forward
quote.name: you creep. You little coward who can only move forward by using the method of elimination. Until you found something to reject... You shall just lie on the ground helplessly."

quote.quotes: "I won't die no matter what. That's what I believe
quote.anime: so stay silent and believe in me. I am a guy who will never die."

quote.quotes: "Oh

quote.anime: as the giant Arrancar charges a Cero after making a comment on Komamura's strength] I see...Then I shall stop that yawn in its tracks. Bankai."

quote.quotes: "Don't retreat
quote.anime: Tetsuzaemon. No matter what. You stand firm right behind me!"

quote.quotes: "[thinking at the grave of Tosen's friend] O' anonymous friend of Tousen... If you had been there...What would you have said to stop him?"
quote.name: Komamura Sajin

quote.quotes: "Let us commence

quote.quotes: "[during Tosen
quote.anime: Gin Ichimaru and Sosuke Aizen's escape from Soul Society] Get down here
quote.id: Tosen! Why did you become a Shingami? Was it not for your deceased friend? Was it not to carry out justice!? Where is your justice now!?"

quote.quotes: "[holds up juice box] How do you drink from this?"

quote.quotes: "You can see me? Rather
"I see. I feel a strong pulse."

quote.quotes: "Have you been out on the window ledge all this time
quote.anime: in plain sight? What if the neighbors report a silver haired elementary student burglar?"

quote.quotes: "I already told you...you can't kill me with that sword anymore!"
quote.name: Abarai Renji

quote.quotes: "If you wanna talk to me
quote.anime: do it while I cut you to pieces. But
quote.id: I'm not gonna hold back one bit! Bankai!"
quote.name: Bleach

quote.quotes: "Don't just blame yourself. You're not tough enough to withstand everything. Split the load
quote.id: and to Ichigo's. Just stack it little by little. That's why we've become stronger. Believe in him
quote.name: Rukia."

quote.quotes: "I've always been afraid...Always been pretending to follow you closely
quote.anime: always pretending to sharpen my fangs
quote.id: when the truth is...I'm scared to death just treading on your shadow."
quote.name: Bleach

quote.quotes: "I shall light a fire upon the fang that falls short
quote.anime: so that I needn't see that star...So that it shall not tear this throat of mine."

quote.quotes: "Ichigo...I know this is shameful
quote.anime: but I'm begging you -- Rukia...Please save Rukia!!"

quote.quotes: "The stray dog in me is dyed into my bones... All I do is howl at the moon
quote.anime: but I don't have the guts to bite..."

quote.quotes: "Howl
"I knew it. You can't even ask your own zanpakutō its name."
quote.name: Abarai Renji

quote.quotes: "You're just an overnight shinigami. You couldn't put one scratch on us real ones."
quote.name: Abarai Renji

quote.quotes: "*to Ichigo* So you're the human who got his powers from Rukia?"
quote.name: Abarai Renji

quote.quotes: "I'll tattle-tale to Yachiru if you keep that up
"I don't know if you noticed
"I hate talkative guys... They gross me out."
quote.name: Matsumoto Rangiku

quote.quotes: "Growl
"[Rangiku steps out of the bath naked to comfort a crying Orihime] There
quote.name: you poor thing. Drown all of your sorrows in my chest!"

quote.quotes: "[to Momo on Aizen's final letter] As a vice-captain
quote.anime: I think it's a great honor to be the receiver of her captain's final words. Read it well."

quote.quotes: "[thinking as Nel tells her to cheer for Ichigo] That's right. To begin with
quote.anime: I came here just thinking I wanted to protect everyone. But when I heard they had come to save me
quote.id: I couldn't help but feel a little glad
quote.name: just a bit in my heart. When I look at Kurosaki-kun in that mask

quote.quotes: "Kurosaki-kun... I'm weak
quote.anime: so it's always like I turn back to look to you for help. But now I won't turn back and I'll go forward. The next time we meet I won't look to you for help
quote.name: I'll be able to fight on my own."

quote.quotes: "We don't look any different from those shinigami. We just dress diferently."
quote.name: Inoue Orihime

quote.quotes: "It's just that... It's just that not being able to fight with everyone makes me feel lonely...!! But what would make me feel worse than being lonely is getting in everyone's way... that would make me feel worse!! If it means getting in the way of Kurosaki-kun and everyone... then I would rather be lonely
"I'm a terrible person
quote.anime: aren't I? 'If only Kurosaki-kun would cheer up
quote.name: I thought that was how I felt. Then Kuchiki-san came back and cheered Kurosaki-kun up. I should have been really happy

quote.quotes: "If I were the rain
quote.anime: that binds together the heavens and the earth
quote.id: whom in all eternity will never mingle
quote.name: would I be able to bind two hearts together?"

quote.quotes: "[to Nemu about Uryuu. Nemu is currently attempting to restrain Uryuu so Mayruri can heal him
quote.anime: but she is unknowingly smothering him with her breasts] Yes
quote.id: Nemu. Just smother him with those things. Worst case
quote.name: he dies happy."

quote.quotes: "[to Szayel Aporro Grantz] Immaculate being... Was it? In this secular existence
quote.id: regardless of those who utter the contrary. This is the reality. Common man seeks it out
quote.name: they strive to achieve it

quote.quotes: "[upon arriving at Szayel Aporro Grantz's location] Arrancar
quote.id: Arrancar... Espada! Hueco Mundo is quite the treasure trove."
quote.name: Bleach

quote.quotes: "Oh
quote.anime: you know what I'm talking about. That stupid line that all you Quincies keep saying up until the moment you die. By the honor of the Quincy I cannot do this
quote.id: by the honor of the Quincy I won't allow that. Quincy this
quote.name: Quincy that! Every last one of you! It's so annoying!"

quote.quotes: "Killing you now will be as easy as strangling a baby."

quote.quotes: "A grenade that's thrown should not come back."

quote.quotes: "[to Chad and Orihime] Your transformation is not a disease. You were just given the key to the door in front of you. There's no need to know the cause. No need for sorrow or sadness. What comes next is up to you. You can use your keys to open the door...or lock it tight. And if you do choose to open it... You can still decide not to pass through."
quote.name: Urahara Kisuke

quote.quotes: "Awaken
"[Singing to Yammy] Aizen-sama will get maaaad at youuuu!"
quote.name: Urahara Kisuke

quote.quotes: "Oh
quote.anime: it IS a chore. Risking your life and keeping busy are all the same!"

quote.quotes: "Noooo
quote.id: a mere handsome and sexy shopkeeper
quote.name: could possibly have bankai!"

quote.quotes: "[To Yoruichi] It's alright! Kurosaki-san's potential is greater than mine!"

quote.quotes: "[Sees Yoruichi in cat form] Yes! It's Yoruichi! You've come back! Ha ha ha!! [Picks her up] Come here you little devil
quote.anime: let me take a look at you! You're my fuzzy little troublemaker
quote.id: yes you are! Now who's your daddy? Hmm?"

quote.quotes: "I'll drive you into a corner and make you remember that attack."

quote.quotes: "[Urahara writes Ichigo a message in blood] Please meet at Urahara shop immediately. [After Ichigo freaked out] P.S: If you look at this message and think that it is the message of a person before his death... then you have no sense of humor."

quote.quotes: "A warrior who has lost his ability to fight is only going to be in the way."
quote.name: Urahara Kisuke

quote.quotes: "Lately
quote.anime: I've been looking at these two guys only. As expected
quote.id: I see flowers when there are women in the workplace... the atmosphere!"
quote.name: Bleach

quote.quotes: "[In his Resurrección form] I can see! I can see! I can see!!! So this is the sky!! So this is blood!! So this is the world!! ...So this is what you look like. Komamura. You are uglier... than I thought."

quote.quotes: "[to Hisagi after stabbing him] I am afraid. Then and now
quote.anime: my fear has always been that I would die a shinigami like you."

quote.quotes: "[to Komamura] Don't make me laugh. Aizen-sama has given me something far more powerful than a bankai."

quote.quotes: "[to Hisagi] Open my eyes? You? Open my eyes? You never change."
