quote.quotes: "[after Hisagi thanks him] Aren't you clever? Is that supposed to be sarcastic?"
quote.name: Tousen Kaname

quote.quotes: "I knew it would. Someday we would cross swords and one of us will die."
quote.name: Tousen Kaname

quote.quotes: "It must make you sick to know an underling like me is going to kill you."
quote.name: Tousen Kaname

quote.quotes: "I was trying to chop off your head from the eye up. A little scratch counts as a miss."
quote.name: Tousen Kaname

quote.quotes: "Justice without a great cause begets nothing more than slaughter. That same slaughter in a great cause...Is Justice."
quote.name: Tousen Kaname

quote.quotes: "I told you before
quote.anime: Komamura. The only paths that I see with these eyes are the ones not dyed with blood. Those paths are the paths to justice. So whichever path I choose...Is justice."

quote.quotes: "If it's not enough to believe in justice
quote.anime: then I will become justice. I will seek out all evil in this world and wipe them out like the clouds in the sky. I swear I will...For justice."

quote.quotes: "[about his deceased friend] I never overcame my shyness and told her that I actually liked clouds."
quote.name: Tousen Kaname

quote.quotes: "[to Kenpachi Zaraki
quote.anime: after Tosen's senses-robbing Bankai still does not discourage the Eleventh Division Captain from fighting] I see. It's understandable. You are a demon. You belong in the darkness. So of course you do not fear it."

quote.quotes: "I do not hate you. However
quote.name: Bleach

quote.quotes: "[to Kenpachi Zaraki] I did not say that I hate you. What I mean to say is that you are unforgivable!!"
quote.name: Tousen Kaname

quote.quotes: "When we die
quote.anime: our bodies disintegrate and become part of the reishi that make up Soul Society. And when that time comes...where does your heart go? It gets passed on to your nakama (comrades). If you pass it on to them
quote.id: then your heart will always live on within them. Kuchiki
quote.name: that's why...you must never

quote.quotes: "Whenever you fight from this point on
quote.anime: there is one thing you must never do. Which is...to die alone."

quote.quotes: "Every time you and I interact...a bit of 'heart' is born between us. Heart isn't something inside you. But whenever you think
quote.id: that's when heart is born. I mean
quote.name: if you were the only one alive in the whole world

quote.quotes: "The fight to protect life and the fight to protect honor——that's Captain Ukitake's policy. But you know
quote.anime: Kuchiki...I think that in the end
quote.id: those both end up being the same thing. ...Heart."

quote.quotes: "[when Rukia asks why she is in the Gotei 13] What the hell?! That's so obvious! To 'fight' and to 'protect'!"

quote.quotes: "[dying] Kuchiki
quote.anime: I dragged you into this...I'm sorry. You must've been scared. Thanks
quote.id: Kuchiki. Thanks to you...I can leave my heart here."

quote.quotes: "Uncoil the seas and heavens

quote.anime: I'm on your side until death and beyond."

quote.quotes: "The Commander-General's rather violent today
"If you were in this situation
quote.anime: what would you have done? You would run after Byakuya...And then kick him in the butt
quote.id: right? No matter how one captain complains
quote.name: the Central Government won't change their decision for one person. But if it was you

quote.quotes: "My
"If you save Kaien
quote.anime: then what becomes of his pride? If you go to his aid now
quote.id: his life will be saved. But... at the same time
quote.name: it would end up killing his pride for all eternity."

quote.quotes: "All waves
quote.anime: rise now and become my shield
quote.name: strike now and become my blade! Sōgyo no Kotowari!"

quote.quotes: "You may be able to save us. If you stay and protect us. But what's good is that everyone else dies! Please go!! Captain Komamura!!!"

quote.anime: until my opponent can no longer bear the weight and falls to the ground. And then they bow their head as if in apology. That's why it's called 'Wabisuke'."

quote.quotes: "War is not heroic. War is not exhilarating. War is full of despair. It's dark. It's dreadful. It's a thing of sorrow and gloom."

quote.quotes: "Farewell
quote.anime: warrior of the sky. I pray... you don't forgive me."

quote.quotes: "Raise your head
"[in reference to Mizuho Asano

quote.quotes: "You can't carry me AND dodge at the same time

quote.anime: and I really didn't feel like using it this early either. Better watch closely
quote.id: and make sure you don't tell a soul! Bankai!!"

quote.quotes: "Well
quote.anime: you sure have weird ways of doing things. The one who taught me how to give your name out to he whom you are about to kill also said... that it was always the last lesson he taught his students. That way
quote.id: if you do end a person's life... at the very least
quote.name: they will know the name of the one who slashed their mortal coil. I'm of the 11th Division

quote.quotes: "Live well
quote.name: go bald well

quote.quotes: "I didn't hate it as much as I said. That hollow
quote.anime: that is. If there's anything that I've truly hated for 20 years without thinking twice... it'd have to be the fact that I failed to save Masaki on that night."

quote.quotes: "It's one of the basics... So I will teach you. A shinigami at the rank of Captain can control the size of his zanpakuto got it? Otherwise everyone'd carry around ginormous swords... just like you. Remember this well. You can't fathom the power of your rival simply from the size of his zanpakuto. You shouldn't give lectures about Shinigami until you understand that."
quote.name: Kurosaki Isshin

quote.quotes: "[to Yuzu] Ah! It's okay
quote.id: don't cry! Daddy will show you something really hilarious!"

quote.quotes: "[to Karin] Do as your heart desires! Jump into your father's bosom!"

quote.quotes: "GOOD MOOOORNING ICHIGOOOOOO!!!!"

quote.quotes: "We can't waste time worrying about the what-if's. Rukia's execution date has been changed to noon tomorrow. So what? If the deadline has been changed to tomorrow... I'll just have to finish today!"

quote.id: I belie- NO WAY I'LL BELIEVE THAT
quote.name: DUMBASS!"

quote.quotes: "Dammit
quote.anime: is that how you greet your son who went out of his way to help a ghost on the way home?!"

quote.quotes: "[about his Hollow group prior to them becoming Arancar as he eats pieces of them] You sicken me. You're all just a bunch of bloody cowards. Alright
quote.anime: I'll eat all of you. You'll see how it feels on the next level
quote.id: as a part of my own flesh. I am... I am the king!"

quote.anime: you're gonna accompany me on a little errand."

quote.anime: a Soul Reaper or even a Hollow! I'll crush anybody who looks down on me! And you
quote.name: will be the first to go!"

quote.quotes: "[to Ichigo] You're a Soul Reaper and I'm a Hollow. Whichever side loses will be massacred! It's been that way for over a thousand years! Who needs any more reason than that?! Now bring it! The last man standing gets to go home alive! That's all there is to it!"

quote.quotes: "[about Ulquiorra Cifer
quote.anime: after he takes out Ichigo] I'll teach him what happens when you steal someone else's prey."

quote.quotes: "[to Ichigo] Don't forget my name

quote.anime: to Rangiku Matsumoto] I've decided. I'm going to become a Shinigami. Become a Shinigami and change things. So that they'll end...without Rangiku having to cry."

quote.anime: I've got nothin' like that. I told you when we first met

quote.name: no emotions

quote.quotes: "[Referring to Tosen] He's such a boy scout
"Oops. They found us."

quote.quotes: "[To Rukia as she is taken to Sokyoku Hill] Bye Bye
quote.anime: Rukia chan! See 'ya at the execution grounds."

quote.quotes: "If you pull your sword in a place like this
quote.anime: I'll just have to stop you

quote.quotes: "Sorry

quote.name: Ichimaru Gin

quote.quotes: "No matter how strong a defense
quote.anime: a stronger offense will always shatter it."

quote.quotes: "'Control'... you say? When you stand before me... that word holds no meaning. Bankai. Senbonzakura Kageyoshi."
quote.name: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote.quotes: "Exactly when did I say that I do this because I am a shinigami? My killing you is no other reason than the fact that you... Pointed your blade [view shifts to Rukia] at my pride."
quote.name: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote.quotes: "The arrogant one is you
quote.anime: Espada. But rest at ease. The reason for your loss is not due to that arrogance. It is simply due to a difference in power."

quote.quotes: "You and I...our levels are as distant as the earth from the heavens. ...Must I spell it out for you? I have discarded my left arm
quote.id: and yet even then I have not nearly lowered myself to your level."

quote.quotes: "It is a thousand years too early... for you to become worthy enough to die by my Bankai."
quote.name: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote.quotes: "Well done. That time
"Be proud as someone who
quote.anime: after being struck by this power
quote.id: is still able to retain the shape of a body."
quote.name: Bleach

quote.quotes: "Your blade will never be able to touch me. Ever."
quote.name: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote.quotes: "Put away your sword and you shall live...unless you're still dreaming about defeating me. Did you forget
quote.anime: or did it just never occur to you...that I have Bankai as well?"

quote.quotes: "The curtain that falls at the end...shall be pulled down by the blade of my sword."
quote.name: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote.quotes: "That's not possible. With your ability
quote.anime: you couldn't even make one of my knees touch the ground."

quote.quotes: "The Kuchiki clan is one of the four noble houses. We must set the standard for all shinigami. If we do not abide by the code...then who will uphold it?"
quote.name: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote.quotes: "No choice
quote.anime: then. Before you become intoxicated by your own power
quote.id: I shall show you a decisive power gap that you could not overcome in a millennium of struggle."
quote.name: Bleach

quote.quotes: "Are you telling me to exploit an opening for the likes of you? Do not speak out of your league

quote.name: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote.quotes: "Scatter
"You're slow

quote.name: Kagura

quote.quotes: "Shinpachi
quote.anime: just remember this... We aren't friends with justice or even your sister. We're YOUR friends."

quote.quotes: "Gin-san
quote.anime: aren't you gonna make fun of me? Are you just gonna ignore me?!"

quote.quotes: "I watch over Gin-san to protect him. Just like a fairy
"*about Katsura
quote.anime: who apparently got his head hit very hard* Forget his name
quote.id: this guy's questioning his own existence!"
quote.name: Gintama

quote.quotes: "*while eating Super Spicy Senbei* It's spicy... It's spicy. Damn it
quote.anime: why am I... It's so spicy I have tears in my eyes."

quote.quotes: "I just...    ...want to make the woman I love happy."
quote.name: Hijikata Toushirou

quote.quotes: "*to Okita* I don't care about that gap you created on your own. I'll jump across it as many times as it takes
quote.anime: and punch some sense into you."

quote.quotes: "If someone went the wrong way
quote.anime: the other two would beat him up until he got back on track. That's how it always been. That's why we'll always stay on the right path!"

quote.quotes: "*talking about Shinsengumi* Every time I'm with all of you
quote.anime: there's always a gap. I'm different from all of you."

quote.quotes: "I smelled something: The scent of a Lunar Flower. It was coming from this city."

quote.quotes: "[talking to Kiba
quote.anime: who is being held in a cage] Man
quote.id: you really screwed up. I mean

quote.quotes: "[to Toboe] I wanted to take you to paradise."

quote.quotes: "I finished Hige off. I don't want to move any more either. I knew it from the beginning
quote.anime: I knew it somewhere in my heart. That's why I led a spontaneous life. I was confident after having met you... that I wasn't the one who would open Paradise. [groans]"

quote.quotes: "[tsume bites into his neck] Let's meet up again in Paradise."

quote.quotes: "Can you do me a favor? Could you kill me with your fangs? Can you still not forgive me? Am I still a traitor?"

quote.quotes: "That hot dog must've fried your brain!"
quote.name: Hige

quote.quotes: "*to Hige* Coming from you
"We would not have met
quote.anime: and the flowers will protect you. Kiba
quote.name: the flowers will return and bloom once more. So when the world is reborn

quote.quotes: "They say there's no such place... as Paradise. Even if you search to the ends of the Earth
quote.anime: there's nothing there. No matter how far you walk
quote.id: it's always the same road. It just goes on and on. But
quote.name: in spite of that... Why am I so driven to find it? A voice calls to me... It says

quote.quotes: "I hate sweets."

quote.quotes: "Even if my left arm can transform into a monstrous claw and can destroy Akuma
quote.anime: im just a normal person with a promise..."

quote.quotes: "Inside your mouth

quote.quotes: "I don't like lectures from someone who plays fixed matches."

quote.quotes: "As time goes by without anyone eating it
quote.anime: it starts getting dry and looking anything but appetizing
quote.id: and no one's willing to make a move
quote.name: but when the busboy takes it you go 'wait

quote.quotes: "Can you stop guessing if they got the question right based on the amount of time left when they cut to commercial!?"

quote.quotes: "Hijikata-san. I forgot my flute at the headquarters
quote.anime: so I'm gonna go back and get it real quick."

quote.anime: I find myself far from hating him
quote.id: actually hoping that those wounds will scar
quote.name: like burns...because then you can never forget me."

quote.id: all I see are the faces of the order and my friends... I am an awful person aren't I? Instead of the real world
quote.name: all I care about is my friends. That's because they are my whole world... Even if just one of my friends dies

quote.quotes: "The best way to live a full life is to be a child

quote.anime: we always ate hot dogs during class."

quote.quotes: "Do you really intend to lose even more of your friends for something like that? I'll pass on that. As long as I'm alive

quote.quotes: "Katsura
quote.anime: just stop this. No matter how elegant you think dying is
quote.id: your death won't appease your conscience and won't change anything."

quote.quotes: "Shut up you! What's with that TV drama attitude?!"

quote.quotes: "I want to put an end to the war between humans and vampires – a war that has been continuing in the darkness of history since ancient times! I want the young vampires
quote.anime: with their natural intelligence and unfettered hearts
quote.id: to become a bridge between the two species!! I'm educating them for that purpose! That is why I created the Night Class!"

quote.quotes: "*to Yuki* You have stopped opening your heart to me. That's the only thing about you that has to change."

quote.quotes: "Are you sure? Even if the hidden truth is drenched in blood... Do you still want to know?"

quote.quotes: "I've been wondering ever since before

quote.quotes: "It's all right
quote.anime: for now. Yuki will eventually come to me."

quote.quotes: "Humans should never be turned into vampires. But in the old days
quote.id: when the war between vampires and vampire hunters was at its peak
quote.name: vampires turned many humans into vampires to use in battle. And now the aristocrats have the duty to manage those survivors. Sometimes we have to kill them off..."

quote.quotes: "It's all right. You be just the way you are
quote.anime: Yuki. You're different from the Night Class students who wait on me... You're a warm-hearted girl
quote.name: Vampire Knight

quote.quotes: "The blood has stopped flowing
quote.anime: but the puncture wounds...he really pierced you deeply. Yuki...does it hurt? Are you afraid of vampires now?"

quote.quotes: "You devoured her mercilessly. She can't even stand up. Was her blood so delicious?"
quote.name: Kaname Kuran

quote.quotes: "A human bitten by a pureblood vampire transforms into a vampire. When that happens
quote.anime: there can be only one of two results
quote.id: dying from the loss of blood
quote.name: or unfavorably surviving and suffering the pain of slowly transforming into a vampire. Other vampires don't possess this dark power that purebloods have. I respect his strength of will

quote.quotes: "Headmaster Cross
quote.anime: how much longer are you going to keep Zero in the Day Class? That time is approaching for him."

quote.quotes: "After we turn around
quote.anime: the next time we see each other
quote.name: Vampire Knight

quote.quotes: "Listen up
quote.anime: brats! Get the hell back to your dorms! Why do I have to deal with you running around screaming 'Kyaa! Kyaa!' every damn day?! Why?!"

quote.quotes: "But you thought it would be okay to become a vampire
quote.anime: right? I will never let you turn into something like that. Even if it means I have to make Kaname Kuran my enemy...and even if it means you will hate me."

quote.quotes: "Former humans eventually fall into the Level E category
quote.anime: Yuki. They gradually lose their sanity
quote.name: Vampire Knight

quote.quotes: "I borrowed it from the Headmaster. It's a gun to use against vampires. If I lose the human part of me
quote.anime: and go mad as a vampire...shoot me with that gun. Not yet
quote.id: but that day will eventually come. Kill me by your own hand then."
quote.name: Vampire Knight

quote.quotes: "I couldn't stop myself from devouring you. I may kill the next human I target as my prey. Shoot me. You're afraid of me
quote.anime: aren't you? Hold the gun with both hands
quote.id: and aim straight. Aim for my heart. It's not a crime to kill a vampire."
quote.name: Vampire Knight

quote.quotes: "You heard it too? The sound of your blood being sucked in by me. After such a hair-raising experience you can't act as if nothing has changed. So don't interfere anymore."

quote.quotes: "Come on vampires. I've been pissed off lately."

quote.quotes: "The Headmaster talks about the Night Class like they're good vampires who support his pacifism
quote.anime: but I don't trust them. I won't let my guard down. I'm cooperating so I can find the most effective way to kill those beasts in human form."

quote.quotes: "I will keep running away so Zero has a reason to live."
quote.name: Yuki Kuran

quote.quotes: "Both of us understand
quote.anime: but neither of us will say it. It's a sin to keep a vampire alive by offering my own blood as bait. We are doing something that is forbidden. No one must find out about this."

quote.quotes: "Being like this makes me feel like we've returned to the old days somewhat. Yeah. Zero is Zero. Even if you are a vampire now."

quote.quotes: "I didn't understand anything. Zero suffered and suffered for four years. What were you thinking
quote.anime: all by yourself? He loathes vampires so much
quote.id: he wants to kill them all. All this time
quote.name: Zero wanted to kill himself too."

quote.quotes: "Yuki
quote.anime: I can't accept it after all
quote.id: that my most precious girl was bitten by another."

quote.quotes: "When I think of him
quote.anime: I feel so much love and such sadness...is it a bad thing that the same feeling makes me want to latch onto his throat and devour his blood and even his life to taste his feelings in it?"

quote.quotes: "I refuse to breathe the same air as those creatures. I refuse to wear the stupid uniform full of buttons that those creatures wear. If I am imprisoned in a classroom full of those creatures

quote.quotes: "You are the only one who brings color into the dull gray ashes that my heart is."

quote.quotes: "If my only option I have is to lose you

The successors of the generations killed three years prior would come to me as long as I am the head of the Phantomhive family that stands in their way. I'm waiting ...for them to come and try to kill me here."

quote.name: fight

quote.quotes: "I wonder...do you have it
quote.anime: young as you are... the Will of Fire?"

quote.quotes: "He has combined Shadow Clone with his own invention
quote.anime: the Sexy Jutsu. What a foolish ninja technique...and he could probably get me with it
quote.name: Naruto

quote.quotes: "I am the Fifth Hokage... You've trampled on our ancestors treasure...their dream...and you will pay the price! As the Hokage
quote.anime: I will put a stop to you here and now!"

quote.quotes: "*talking to the advisers* People like Jiraiya...and Sarutobi
quote.anime: and Elder Chiyo of the Sand possessed something you two sorely lack. Do you know what that is!? ...Faith! My grandfather
quote.name: believed in you and entrusted you with the village. Now it's your turn to believe in these children and entrust it to them!"

quote.quotes: "Grow up... Death comes with being a shinobi. There are times when death is hard to accept
quote.anime: but if you don't get over it
quote.name: Naruto

quote.quotes: "*to Orochimaru about Naruto* 'I will die before I let you touch him!"
quote.name: Tsunade

quote.quotes: "Why am I putting my life on the line? Because now... I am the Fifth Hokage of the Village Hidden in the Leaves!"
quote.name: Tsunade

quote.quotes: "Jiraiya
quote.anime: are you the one who taught him the Rasengan? Are you acting like a teacher by teaching him something he can't master? Don't give him any ideas! That's why this kid likes to daydream that he's going to become Hokage someday."

quote.quotes: "*about to fight Naruto* One of the Legendary Sannin taking on a snot-nosed Genin... I oughta be ashamed of myself."

quote.quotes: "*last words* Itachi-san... It seems that in the end... I'm not so terrible after all."

quote.quotes: "I get stronger in direct proportion to how strong my opponent is. I do not tire
"*to Asuma* My massive blade
quote.id: doesn't slice... It shreds to ribbons!"
quote.name: Naruto

quote.quotes: "Sharks start out as eggs
quote.anime: but incubate and hatch in the womb. Sometimes the number of pups is less than the number of eggs that were fertilized. Do you know why? Cannibalism. The pups start eating each other within the mother's womb the moment they hatch. They start killing their siblings the moment they enter the world
quote.id: viewing everything they see as nothing more than prey. As of today you and I are fellow members of Akatsuki. So be careful... of me."
quote.name: Naruto

quote.quotes: "I knew that from the first time I had to kill my comrades... Kill a Kiri ninja as a Kiri ninja. What does that make me? Am I a friend or foe? What is my purpose and my position? Where do I go? Where can I go? I'm well aware that my entire life has been a one giant lie."
quote.name: Kisame Hoshigaki

quote.quotes: "*to Kakashi* I died as a human!"
quote.name: Zabuza Momochi

quote.quotes: "*last words* You were always at my side
quote.anime: the least I can do is to be beside you at the end. I know it cannot be
quote.id: but I wish I could go to where you have gone. How I wish I could join you there
quote.name: Haku."

quote.quotes: "I can't think of a more fitting destination for a demon ninja
quote.anime: can you?! I'm told there are many demons down there - of all shapes and sizes! Oh yes
quote.id: I should fit right in! You
quote.name: on the other hand

quote.quotes: "Even the unremarkable Demon of the Hidden Mist can die and become a real Demon in hell!"
quote.name: Zabuza Momochi

quote.quotes: "Uh uh...I won't be joining Haku. Where he's gone I cannot follow. We wouldn't be welcome where Haku's gone to. Hell's where WE'RE going
"Well? Cat got your tongue? Are you so surprised to discover that I'm human? Even shinobi are human. No matter how hard we try
quote.anime: we always fail to escape that simple fact. Well at least
quote.name: Naruto

quote.quotes: "*to Naruto* Your words cut deep
"When you've hovered between life and death so many times that it doesn't faze you
quote.anime: you may be called a ninja. When you've become so deadly that your profile has been entered into my bingo book
quote.id: then you may have earned the title ninja."

quote.quotes: "You're right. Those little people and their little dreams
quote.anime: why should I care about them?! I have my own dream!"

quote.quotes: "When I was your age
quote.anime: my hands were already soaked in blood..."

quote.quotes: "I used to always cry and give up... I made many wrong turns... But you... You helped me find the right path... I always chased after you... I wanted to catch up to you... I wanted to walk beside you all the time... I just wanted to be with you... You changed me! Your smile is what saved me! That is why I'm not afraid to die protecting you! Because... I love you..."
quote.name: Hinata Hyuuga

quote.quotes: "I won't let you lay another finger on Naruto!"
quote.name: Hinata Hyuuga

quote.quotes: "*to Naruto* You make mistakes... but... because of those mistakes... you get the strength to stand up to them. That's why I think you are truly strong."

quote.quotes: "*to Naruto* When I watch you
quote.id: like I can do anything - that even I am worth something."

quote.quotes: "You're wrong
quote.anime: Neji... Because I can see that you are suffering more than me... You are the one who is confused and suffering inside the fate of the head and branch families."

quote.quotes: "Was I able to change myself...even a little
"I will never go back on my word
quote.anime: because that too is my ninja way!"

quote.quotes: "By the way
"My name is Uzumaki Naruto. I like ramen. I hate the three minutes you have to wait while the water boils. And my dream is to one day become a Hokage. Then everyone will have to respect me at last."
quote.name: Naruto Uzumaki

quote.quotes: "Sasori...your strength came because of your soul
quote.anime: not in spite of it. You tried to erase it
quote.name: but couldn't change completely. Now you've got your immortal body

quote.quotes: "How well or poorly we execute our ambush will have a huge impact on this war and how many casualties we suffer. If you wanna protect your friends and family
quote.anime: the only thing you should be thinking about is how to make this operation a success!"

quote.quotes: "*to Naruto* Aww
quote.anime: don't sweat it. Women always go weak in the knees for that cool
quote.id: elite type of guy. So what can you do
quote.name: am I right?"

quote.quotes: "Naruto... please save my little brother."

quote.quotes: "I'll show you the real power of the battle puppet Crow."

quote.quotes: "I can't back down when they show me no respect."

quote.quotes: "*thinking about Naruto* This brat...I'm going to kill him."

quote.quotes: "Growth occurs when one goes beyond one's limits. Realizing that is also part of training."

quote.quotes: "*last words* Forgive me Sasuke... It ends with this."

quote.quotes: "*to Kisame* Those who turn their hands against their comrades are sure to die a terrible death. Be prepared."

quote.quotes: "The people of this clan are all the same. You focus on the trivial
quote.anime: and lose sight of what's most important. Change is impossible
quote.id: in this fog of ignorance. How can we evolve when regulation is all we know?"
quote.name: Naruto

quote.quotes: "I've had enough
quote.anime: there's no hope left for this pathetic clan."

quote.quotes: "Don't cry
quote.anime: Sasuke. Your big brother is here to protect you
quote.name: Naruto

quote.quotes: "You and I are flesh and blood. I'm always going to be there for you
quote.anime: even if it's only as an obstacle for you to overcome. Even if you do hate me. That's what big brothers are for."

quote.quotes: "*last words* Just when me and Kakashi were becoming friends... I couldn't bring myself to confess to Rin... I wish I had more time with everyone..."
quote.name: Obito Uchiha

quote.quotes: "*to Kakashi* I'm about to... die... but I'll become your eye."

quote.quotes: "I believe the 'White Fang' is a true hero!"

quote.quotes: "*to Kakashi* I am Uchiha Obito and I will surpass you once I awaken my Sharingan!"

quote.quotes: "I have already awakened."

quote.quotes: "I don't understand what's going on

quote.quotes: "*to Naruto* Finding a new me
quote.anime: that is the lesson you taught me."

quote.quotes: "I decided I wished to be like you as well
quote.id: and for that reason...with Orochimaru-sama now intregrated into this body
quote.name: I plan on finding a new 'me'

quote.quotes: "Hehehe...you can't beat me. You have no skills

quote.anime: saying you were like his own grandchild. He had faith that you were the one who would inherit his will
quote.id: and truly believed that you would one day be a great Hokage. Lord Jiraiya will always watch over you. Even this very minute
quote.name: he's watching from somewhere. He wouldn't be happy seeing you sad like this. So...be your usual self

quote.anime: has it been lonely for you Naruto

quote.anime: I'll hit the dummy 800 times! If I can't hit the dummy 800 times

quote.quotes: "*last words* The Tale of Naruto Uzumaki... yes... that has a nice ring to it."

quote.quotes: "There

quote.quotes: "*to Naruto* I think we all have to acknowledge you. Gamatatsu
quote.name: Tsunade...and I... We all admit you've worked really hard. But I wonder what's pushing you forward."

quote.quotes: "Never go back on your word...and never give up. That's your ninja way...and as your mentor ... I have no business whining! Because the student's ninja way should be the master's too! Isn't that so

quote.anime: heading toward Orochimaru. We can't allow such evil to take someone from our village... that is not our way."

quote.quotes: "Father
quote.anime: is a person's destiny a thing like a cloud flowing with an inescapable flow? Or can a person choose the flow he wishes... I still don't know the answer to this. Either way the destination may be the same in the end. However by choosing to live like the latter
quote.id: a person can live and strive towards a goal. And in this match I have finally understood those who have that are truly strong. Father

quote.quotes: "It will be a new world... A world of truth

quote.quotes: "*talking about Naruto* This child... intrigues me to no end!"

quote.quotes: "Hate only gives birth to even more hate."

quote.anime: talking about Tsunade) The best medicines always taste bitter."

quote.quotes: "*to Ino* Didn't you know? Women have to be strong in order to survive!"

quote.quotes: "In the ninja world

quote.anime: as usual* A cute girl stopped me on the way

quote.quotes: "Naruto

quote.id: but you'll bleed to death if you lose any more blood... Seriously..."

quote.quotes: "People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That's how they define 'reality'. But what does it mean to be 'correct' or 'true'? Merely vague concepts... Their 'reality' may all be a mirage. Can we consider them to simply be living in their own world
"If you want to kill me
quote.name: and live in an unsightly way... Run

quote.quotes: "You aren't even worth killing

quote.anime: that's fine. Following Itachi's path would be childish
quote.id: the whispering of fools who don't know hatred. If anyone else tries to ridicule the way I live

quote.id: how on earth could you possibly understand

quote.anime: Naruto and Sakura* My name is Sasuke Uchiha. I hate a lot of things

quote.name: because I will make it a reality. I'm going to restore my clan

quote.quotes: "Hey
quote.anime: you stupid fox! You're in my body and you owe me rent! So for payment
quote.id: I'll take your chakra! You got that?!"

quote.quotes: "The pain of being alone...is not an easy one to bear. Why is it...that I can understand your pain? But...I already have many people who are important to me now...and I can't let you hurt any of them. Even if I have to kill you!"

quote.quotes: "I won't run away anymore... I won't go back on my word... That is my ninja way!"

quote.quotes: "Let the heavens deal with life and death
